45010020	Tɛr debm taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki ron̰ Ezayi se, aay kaamin̰ bini taaɗɗen daala ɔɔ: Maam Raa se, jee kɛn jem ey se ɓo, ɔŋumga. Ɔɔ jee kɛn je te ɗoobum ey se ɓo, maam m'taaɗɗen roma.
45010021	Gaŋ ute gaan Israɛlge se Raa taaɗ ɔɔ: Ɓii‑raa maam m'ɔl jim m'daŋ gaan Israɛlge m'ɔɔ aɗe ɓaa gɔtum ki naɓo naaɗe se, jee naajn̰ taarge ɔɔ baate tookŋ Taaruma.
45011001	Tɛr m'tɔnd mɛtse daala: bin num Raa se, baatega jeen̰ge la? Gɔtɔ! Naan̰ baatɗen te eyo. Taa maam kic m'kɔɗ Israɛl, m'teeco mɛtjil Abraam ki ɔɔ m'teeco taa ɓee Benjamin ki.
45011002	Bin num Raa se jeen̰gen naan̰ bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗen do dɔkin̰ se, naan̰ baatɗen te eyo. Ey num naase 'booyin̰ki te ey la, taar kɛn k'raaŋo maakŋ Kitap ki, kɛn taaɗ ute Ɛli, debm kɛn taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki, kaaɗ kɛn naan̰ sakak gaan Israɛlge gɔtn Raa ki, naan̰ ɔɔ:
45011003	Mɛluma, jee kɛn taaɗ taar teeco taari ki se, naaɗe tɔɔlɗenoga ɔɔ gɔtn kɛn k'lee k'tɛɗi sɛrkɛ se lɛ, naaɗe tɔɔkin̰ga naatn. Ɔɔ maam lɛ, m'ɔɔpga m'kalum ki sum. Ɔɔ naaɗe je am tɔɔlɔ.
45011004	Num Raa tap ɓo tɛrlin̰ ɔɔ ɗi? Jeege dupu‑cili se, maam m'bɔɔbɗenga ɔɔ naaɗe se ɔŋ ɛrg te naan maragŋ k'daŋin̰ Baal kɛn jeege lee eemin̰ se eyo.
45011005	Ɓɔrse kic ɓo, maakŋ gaan Israɛlge tu se, ɔɔpga jeege cɔkɔ kɛn Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗenga ute bɛɛn̰a.
45011006	Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗe se taa naaɗe ɓo tɛɗga nakŋ bɛɛ eyo, num naan̰ bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗe se ute bɛɛn̰a, kɛn bin ey num, bɛɛ Raa se kɔŋ tɛɗn bɛɛ ey sum.
45011007	Taar se tap ɓo je taaɗ ɔɔ ɗio? Gaan Israɛlge se nakŋ naaɗe je se tap ɓo ɔŋ te eyo. Num jee ɔɔpm kɛn Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗenga tɔɔɗ se ɓo, ɔŋga nakŋ se. Num jee kuuy se lɛ, tɛɗga jee naajn̰ taarge.
45011008	Aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Raa tɛɗɗen naaɗe se jee taara ɛnd doɗe ki eyo, deebɗenga kaamɗe naaɗe ɔŋ aak ɔk eyo ɔɔ turumɗenga biɗege naaɗe ɔŋ booy eyo; bini jaaki kic ɓo, naaɗe utu iŋg gɔtn kiŋgɗeki se sum.
45011009	Maakŋ Kitap ki se, jee se Gaar Daud kic ɓo taaɗ roɗe ki ɔɔ: Ɔn̰ kɔsɗege se aɗen tɛɗn aan gɔɔ rɛɛcn̰ kɛn aɗen tɔnd kɔkɔ. Ɔn̰ 'tɛɗn aan gɔɔ nakŋ aɗen rɔkŋ naaɗe tooco ɔɔ ɔn̰ Raa aɗen dabara.
45011010	Ɔn̰ Raa aɗe tɔɔkŋ kaamɗe mɔɔtn naaɗe kɔŋ kaakŋ ɗim eyo, ɔɔ ɔn̰ aɗen tɔnd daam deere doɗe ki.
45011011	Maam m'je m'tɔnd mɛtse daala: kɛn gaan Israɛlge jaay rɔkŋ tooc se, gɛn sɔrɔkin̰ la? Gɔtɔ! Num ute rɔkŋ toocn̰ kɛn naaɗe tooc se, kaaɗ kɛn se ɓo, Raa kaajn̰ jee kɛn Yaudge eyo. Anum kɛn Raa jaay aaj jee kɛn Yaudge ey se, Yaudge se aakɗega num, maakɗe aɗe kɔɔn̰ɔ ɔɔ je ɗoobm kaaja kici.
45011012	Num kaaɗ kɛn gaan Israɛlge jaay baate tookŋ taar Raa se ɓo, Raa tɛɗn bɛɛn̰ dɛna jeege tun ɓaa se paac. Ɔɔ kɛn Yaudge jaay tɛɗn jee naajn̰ taarge sum se, Raa tɛɗ bɛɛn̰ jeege tun do naaŋ ki paac. Anum 'saapki tu, kaaɗn kɛn jaay gaan Israɛlge utu kɔŋ kaaja se, bɛɛ Raa ese se, utu 'tɛɗn dɛn cir daal ey ne?
45011013	Ɓɔrse, maam m'je taaɗn ute naasen Yaudge ey se. Maam se m'debm kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masi taa naasen Yaudge ey se. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, maam maakum raapo do naab kɛn Raa ɛɗumsin̰ se.
45011014	Maam m'je taasum Yaudge se, jee mɛtin̰ge kaakŋ naabum se aɗe rɔɔn̰ maakɗe ɔɔ aɗen kɔl naaɗe ni ro jeege tu, taa ɓii kalaŋ jee mɛtin̰ge utu kɔŋ kaaja kici.
45011015	Kɛn Raa rɛs gaan Israɛlge kaaɗ kɛn se sum ɓo, naan̰ ɔk taasa ute jee kɛn Yaudge eyo. Num kaaɗ kɛn jaay Raa utu tɛrl kɔkŋ gaan Israɛlge jiga se, kɛse 'tɛɗn ɔɔ ɗi? Kɛse tɛɗn nakŋ bɛɛ aak eyo, 'tɛɗn aan gɔɔ jee ooyga kooyo kɛn Raa utu aɗen kɛɗn kaaja.
45011016	Kɛn mappa jaay k'dup cɔkɔ j'ɛɗga Raa ki se, mappan ɔɔp se paac tɛɗga gɛn Raa. Kɛn kaaga jaay j'ɛɗga mɛt kon̰ Raa ki se, lɛtin̰ se kic ɓo, tɛɗga gɛn Raa.
45011017	Gaan Israɛlge se tec aan gɔɔ ko ɔlibm maakŋ jinɛnɛ ki kɛn k'tɔgŋga ute lɛtin̰gen mɛtin̰ge se. Ɔɔ naai kɛn kɔɗ Yaud ey se tec aan gɔɔ lɛtn ko ɔlibm maakŋ kaag ki ɔɔ naai j'ɔgio ɔɔ k'ɓaaɗo j'ɔli gɔɔ lɛtn ko ɔlib kɛn k'tɔgŋga tɔg lɛtin̰gen mɛtin̰ge se. Ɓɔrse, naai kic iŋg te tɔɔgŋ mɛtn ko ɔlibm kɛn maakŋ jinɛnɛ ki se.
45011018	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, ɔn̰te koono do lɛtn ko ɔlib kɛn k'tɔgɗenoga se. Kɛn ɔli oon tap ɓo taa ɗi? Naai lɛ lɛtɛ sum. Naai ɓo gak ko kaag eyo num ko kaaga ɓo gaki naai.
45011019	Maakse ki se, deb kalaŋ am taaɗn ɔɔ: «Raa se naan̰ ɓo debm 'tɔgŋ lɛtge ɔɔ uunumo ɔɔ ɓaaɗo ɔlum gɔɔɗe ki.»
45011020	Ɗeere, naaɗe se jaay Raa tɔgɗe se taa naaɗe baatega kaal maakɗe don̰ ki ɔɔ naai jaay ɓaaɗo k'j'ɔli gɔɔɗe ki se, taa naai aal maaki don̰ ki. Bin num ɔn̰te magal roi, ɔɔ ɔnd kɔndɔ.
45011021	Ey num Yaudge se ɓo lɛtgen ɗeer ɗeer. Ute naan̰ se kic ɓo, Raa ɔŋ ɔn̰ɗe te eyo. Anum naai lɛtn k'ɓaaɗo k'j'ɔli kɔl gɔɔɗe ki sum se, kɛn naai jaay aal maaki don̰ ki ey se, naan̰ utu ai kɔgŋ kundi naatn kici.
45011022	'Jeelki, Raa se naan̰ debm jiga naɓo naan̰ debm kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do jeege tu kici. Jee ɔn̰ ɗoobm Raa se, naan̰ utu aɗen kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ doɗe ki ɔɔ ute naai se, kɛn naai jaay iŋg aal maaki do bɛɛn̰ ki se, naan̰ debm jiga ute naai. Ey num, ɓɛrɛ, naan̰ ai kɔɔɗn kundi kici.
45011023	Bin ɓo kɛn Yaudge jaay tɛrloga gɔtn Raa ki se, Raa aɗen kɔŋ tɔl gɔɔɗe ki daala, taa Raa se ɔk tɔɔgɔ kɛn tɛɗn naan̰ se.
45011024	Naasen kɛn Yaudge ey se, 'tecki aan gɔɔ lɛtn ko ɔlibm maakŋ kaag ki kɛn k'tɔgin̰o jaay k'ɓaaɗo k'tɔlin̰ gɔɔ lɛtn ko ɔlib kɛn maakŋ jinɛn ki se. Kɛn Raa jaay tɛɗn nakŋ ese se, Yaudge se kic, naan̰ aɗeno tɛrl tɔl gɔɔn̰ ki ey ne, naaɗen kɛn lɛtn ko ɔlibm mala mala se?
45011025	Anum gɛnaamge, maam m'je m'asen taaɗn nakŋ kɛn Raa ɓaa tɛɗa jaay naase 'jeelki mɛtin̰ ey se. Bin ɓo naase aki tɛɗn rose aan gɔɔ jee jeel taar eyo. Taa kɛn gaan Israɛlgen mɛtin̰ge jaay baate tookŋ kaal maakɗe do Raa ki se, bini jee ɓaa se paac aɗe ɓaa gɔtn Raa ki jaayo.
45011026	Ɔɔ bin ɓo gaan Israɛlge paac utu 'kɔŋ kaaja bin kici aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Debm utu 'kɔɔɗn do jeege se, utu aɗe kiin̰ maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Sion ki. Ɔɔ mɛtjil Yakub se, naan̰ utu aɗen kɔɔɗn doɗe maakŋ naajn̰ taarɗe ki.
45011027	Tɛr Raa taaɗ ɔɔ: Kɛse dɔɔkŋ kɛn maam m'utu m'dɔɔkŋ ute naaɗe, kaaɗ kɛn se ɓo maam m'aɗe tɔɔl kusin̰ɗege.
45011028	Yaudge se baate tookŋ Labar Jiga gɛn Isa; taa naan̰ se ɓo naaɗe tɛɗga jee taamooy Raage. Kɛse tɛɗsenga bɛɛ naase ki. Ey num naaɗe se Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗenga tɔɔɗ do dɔkin̰a. Naaɗe se Raa jeɗe, taa ɓugɗege.
45011029	Kɛn Raa jaay bɛɛr ɔɔɗga deba ɔɔ ɛɗin̰ga naka se, mɔɔtn naan̰ tɛrl taarin̰ ey sum.
45011030	Do dɔkin̰ se, naasen kɛn Yaudge ey se, 'baatekiro tookŋ taar Raa. Num kɛn ɓɔrse jaay Yaudge baate tookŋ taar Raa sum se, Raa se tɛɗsenga bɛɛ.
45011031	Ɔɔ kɛn Yaudge jaay baate tookŋ taar Raa se, ute naan̰ se jaay naasen Yaudge ey se, Raa tɛɗsenga bɛɛ. Bin ɓo, ɓɔrse Yaudge Raa utu aɗen tɛɗn bɛɛn̰ kici.
45011032	Taa Raa se ɔn̰ jikilimge paac baate tookŋ taarin̰ se naan̰ ɔn̰ɗe gɔtɗe ki aan gɔɔ ɓulge taa naan̰ je aɗen tɛɗn bɛɛn̰ paac.
45011033	Ɗeere, bɛɛ Raa se dɛn bɛɛ eyo! Raa se naan̰ jeel‑taara ɔɔ nakge paac naan̰ jeelɗe. Nakŋ naan̰ saap jaay uun do se, nam tap ɓo jeel taaɗn tɔɔkŋ mɛtin̰ eyo. Nakgen kɛn naan̰ tɛɗɗen paac se, nam tap ɓo ɔŋ ɔnd ute mɛtin̰ eyo.
45011034	Taa Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Saapm Mɛljege Raa se naŋa tap ɓo jeele? Ɓii kalaŋ tap ɓo naŋa dɛjin̰ga?
45011035	Lɔɓu ɓii kalaŋ nam ɛɗin̰ga ne ɗim deet Raa ki jaay Raa tɛrlin̰ nakin̰ la?
45011036	Ɗeere, nakgen ɓaa se paac, naan̰ ɓo Mɛl‑kaalɗe. Naan̰ ɓo debm kɛn aakɗe doɗe ki ɔɔ nakge se paac kaam jin̰a. Bin num Raa se, ɔn̰ jeege daayum an̰ nooko! Amin!
45012001	Gɛnaamge, 'booyki m'asen taaɗa: aan gɔɔ Raa tɛɗjekiro bɛɛ se, bin se daayum ɛɗki rose paac Raa ki, ɔɔ kiŋgse se ɔn̰in̰ki sɛrkɛ Raa ki. Kɛse ɓo sɛrkŋ salal kɛn tɔɔl Raa ki. Anum Raa se je ɔɔ j'an̰ keeme ute ɗoobm se.
45012002	Ɔn̰te gɛn tɛɗki aan gɔɔ gɛn jee duni kɛn ɓɔrse lee tɛɗ se. Num gaŋ ɔn̰ki Raa asen 'tɛrl maakse ute saapm kuuy kɛn naan̰ asen kɛɗ se. Ute naan̰ se jaay ɓo, naase aki jeel nakŋ Raa maakin̰ jen ro ki. Ɔɔ nakŋ Raa maakin̰ jen se, kɛse nakŋ jiga, nakŋ tɔɔlin̰ naan̰ ki ɔɔ nakŋ mɛc.
45012003	Ute bɛɛ kɛn Raa tɛɗum se, maam m'taaɗsen paac m'ɔɔ: maakŋ kiŋgse ki se ɔn̰te 'kuunki magala; iŋgki ute gɔtn kiŋgse se sum aan gɔɔ kɛn naŋa naŋa kic ɓo Raa ɛɗin̰ga naabin̰ naabin̰ do kaal maakin̰ ki se.
45012004	'Jeelki, debkilimi se ɔk ro kalaŋ sum, naɓo ron̰ se, tɔp kaam dɛna, ɔɔ naŋa kic ute naabin̰ naabin̰a.
45012005	Ɔɔ naajege kic k'dɛnki, naɓo taa naajege k'dɔɔkkiga ute al‑Masi se, k'tum k'tɛɗkiga daa ro kalaŋ ɔɔ naajege kic k'tum k'tɛɗkiga kalaŋ bini.
45012006	Naajege se Raa ɛɗjekiga naaba, naɓo naŋa naŋa kic ɓo ute naabin̰ naabin̰a. Naŋa kic ɓo tɛɗn naaba ute bɛɛ kɛn Raa tɛɗin̰. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, debm kɛn taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki se, ɔn̰ taargen naan̰ taaɗ se aɗe teecn̰ taar Raa ki te ɗoobm kɛn Raa taaɗn ro ki se.
45012007	Debm jaay Raa ɛɗin̰ga naabm gɛn noogŋ jeege se, n̰'aay kaamin̰ n̰'noog jeege ɔɔ debm kɛn Raa ɛɗin̰ga naabm gɛn dooy jeege lɛ, n̰'aay kaamin̰a n̰'dooy jeege.
45012008	Kɛn debm jaay naabin̰ gɛn kɛɗn kaay kaam jeege tu se, n̰'aay kaamin̰ n̰'ɛɗ kaay kaama jeege tu. Ɔɔ debm kɛn ɛɗ naka jeege tu se lɛ, n̰'ɛɗ naka jeege tu ute maakŋ kalaŋ. Ɔɔ debm kɛn Raa jaay ɛɗin̰ga naabm gɛn tɔɔɗn jeege se, naabin̰ se n̰'tɛɗin̰ ute ɗoobin̰a. Ɔɔ debm kɛn Raa jaay tɛɗin̰ga debm kaakŋ taar‑daay jeege se, naabin̰ se, n̰'tɛɗin̰ ute maak‑raapo.
45012009	'Jeki jeege ute maakŋ kalaŋ. Ɔɔɗki dose naatn ro kusin̰ ki. 'Tɛɗn bɛɛ se, ɔkin̰ki tɔɔgɔ.
45012010	'Jeki naapa aan gɔɔ gɛnaagen je naapa se ɔɔ ɔkki naapa ɔɔn̰ɔ.
45012011	Ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki jee kaar‑naabge, naɓo aayki kaamse, 'tɛɗki jee tɛɗn naabge. Ɔɔ Mɛljege se, 'tɛɗin̰ki naabin̰ ute maakŋ kalaŋ.
45012012	Aan gɔɔ naase ɔndkiga dose do Raa ki se, ɔn̰ki maakse 'raapo. Kɛn nakŋ ɔɔn̰ aanga dose ki lɛ, ɔkki maakse tɔɔgɔ ɔɔ aayki kaamse, eemki Raa.
45012013	Gɛnaasegen ɗoobm al‑Masi kɛn ɔk ɗim ey se, aakɗeki doɗe ki. Ɔɔ jee paacn̰ kɛn ɓaa gɔtse ki se ɔkɗeki jiga.
45012014	Jee kɛn lee dabarse se, ɔn̰te 'naamɗeki naɓo 'tɔndki mɛtn Raa aɗen tɛɗn bɛɛ.
45012015	'Tɛɗki maak‑raapo ute jee kɛn maakŋ maak‑raap ki, ɔɔ eemki ute jee kɛn maakŋ kaa‑maan ki.
45012016	Iŋgki bɛɛ ute naapa. Ɔn̰te 'magalki rose. Ɔɔ kɛn j'ɛɗsenga naabm baat gɔɔ ɗi kic ɓo, 'tɛɗin̰ki. Ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki rose aan gɔɔ jee jeel nakge.
45012017	Debm tɛɗsenga kusin̰a se, ɔn̰te 'tɛrlin̰sin̰ki. Ɔɔ aayki kaamse, 'tɛɗki bɛɛ jeege tu paac.
45012018	Kɛn naai jaay ɔk ɗoobo num, aay kaami iŋg ute lapia ute jeege paac.
45012019	Gɛnaa maak‑jemge, kɛn nam jaay tɛɗsenga kusin̰a se, ɔn̰te kɔgki sɛɛse, num ɔn̰ki Raa ɓo 'bɔɔy maak‑taarin̰ doɗe ki. Taa maakŋ Kitap ki se, Mɛljege Raa taaɗga taaɗ ɔɔ: Taar‑don̰ ɔn̰umsin̰ki maam ki ɔɔ maam ɓo m'asen kɔgŋ sɛɛse.
45012020	Bin num Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Kɛn debm taamooyi jaay ɓo tɔɔlin̰ se, ɛɗin̰ kɔsɔ; ɔɔ kɛn maane ɓo tɔɔlin̰ lɛ, ɛɗin̰ 'kaaye. Bin se, naai an̰ kɔl maakŋ sɔkɔn̰ ki.
45012021	Ɔn̰te kɔn̰ki kusin̰ se asen ciri, num naase ɓo 'cirin̰ki ute bɛɛ kɛn naase aki tɛɗa.
45013001	Tɔɔggen iŋg do jeege tu paac se, 'sookɗeki. Taa tɔɔgge se paacn̰ iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki ɔɔ kɛngen ɓɔrse utu do naaŋ ki se kic ɓo Raa ɓo tɔndɗe.
45013002	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, debm baate sookŋ tɔɔgge tu se, kɛse aan gɔɔ naan̰ baate tookŋ tɛɗn nakŋ Raa maakin̰ jen ro ki. Ɔɔ jee baate sookŋ tɔɔgge tu se, nakŋ ɔɔn̰ utu kaan doɗe ki.
45013003	Anum jee tɛɗn nakŋ bɛɛ se, naaɗe ɓeer tɔɔgge tu eyo, num jee tɛɗn nakŋ kusin̰ se ɓo, kɛn ɓeer tɔɔgge tu. Kɛn naai jaay 'je ɓeer tɔɔgge tu ey num, 'tɛɗ bɛɛ. Bin se naaɗe ai tɔɔmɔ.
45013004	'Jeelki, tɔɔgge se naaɗe se kaam ji Raa taa asen noogo gɛn tɛɗn nakgen jiga. Kɛn naase jaay 'tɛɗkiga kusin̰ se, 'ɓeerɗeki. Taa tɔnd kɛn Raa tɔndɗe se cɛr eyo, num naan̰ tɔndɗe se taa an̰ tɛɗn naabin̰a gɛn dabar jee kɛn tɛɗn nakŋ kusin̰a. Ɔɔ ute ɗoobm se ɓo, Raa taaɗ maak‑taarin̰ do jeege tun tɛɗ nakgen jig eyo.
45013005	Kɛn bin num, 'sookki tɔɔgge tu, taa j'asen dabar sum eyo, num 'sookɗeki taa naase 'jeelki maakse ki naabɗe se ute ɗoobin̰a.
45013006	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, naase 'lee ɔgɗeki miiri. Ɔɔ jee kɛn k'tɔndɗe gɛn lee tiir gurs miiri gɔtse ki se, naabm kɛn naaɗe lee tɛɗin̰ ute ɗoobin̰ se, naaɗe tɛɗin̰ gɛn Raa.
45013007	Jee se jaay nakŋ kɛn naaɗe je ɔɔ j'aɗe kɔgse, ɔgɗesin̰ki. Jee tɔkŋ miirge se, 'tiir ɛɗɗeki nakɗe ɔɔ nakgen paacn̰ gɛn kɔgɔ se, ɔgɗesin̰ki. Tɔɔggen kɛn aɗeki sook se, 'sookɗeki. Jeegen aalɗeki kaal maak ki se aalɗeki maak ki kici.
45013008	Ɔn̰te kɔn̰ki sɛɛ nam dose ki. Num sɛɛ kɛn 'tɛɗn dose ki se, 'jeki naapa. Taa debm jaay je naapin̰ se, kɛse Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki se, naan̰ tɛɗ aasin̰ga ute ɗoobin̰a.
45013009	Taa nakgen kɛn Raa taaɗ ɔɔ gɛn tɛɗa kɛn ɔɔ: Ɔn̰te 'kɛɛsn mɛnd nam, ɔn̰te 'kɛɛsn gaaba nam, ɔn̰te 'tɔɔl nam, ɔn̰te 'ɓoogŋ nakŋ nam, ɔn̰ten 'dɔŋ nakŋ nam se. Taargen kuuy ɔɔp se kic paac kon̰ ɓo kɛn ɔɔ: 'Je naapi aan gɔɔ roi mala.
45013010	Anum debm je naapin̰ se tɛɗin̰ kusin̰ eyo. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, debm je jeege se, Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki taaɗ paac se, naan̰ tɛɗ aasin̰ga ute ɗoobin̰a.
45013011	Bin ɓo gɛnaamge, 'tɛɗki nakgen se taa naase 'jeelki kaaɗn ɓɔrsen kɛn j'iŋgki maak ki se. Taa kaaɗn j'anki kiin̰ maakŋ bijege tu se aanga. Taa kaaɗn kɛn Raa utu aɗe ɓaa asen kaaj se, ɔɔpga gɔɔrɔ. Kaaɗn se, dɔk eyo aan gɔɔ kaaɗn kɛn j'utu j'aalki kaal maakjege do Isa ki ey sum.
45013012	Nɔɔrɔ deelga, gɔtɔ ɔɔpga baata kiipi. Nakgen kɛn jeege lee tɛɗ maakŋ gɔt kɛn ɔɔɗ se, ɔɔɗki dose ro ki. 'Jeki nakgen kɛn j'an kuɗn bɔɔrɔ maakŋ gɔt kɛn wɔɔrɔ.
45013013	K'j'iŋgki aan gɔɔ debm kɛn lee maakŋ katara ki. Ɔn̰te 'kɔski anki deel te gɔtin̰a ɔɔ ɔn̰te 'kaayki tɔtɔ kic anki deel te gɔtin̰a, ɔn̰te 'kɛɛski naapa rɛn̰ rɛn̰, ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki nakŋ sɔkɔn̰ge, ɔn̰te 'mooyki te naapa, ɔɔ ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki maak‑kilimi do naapge tu.
45013014	Num ɔn̰ki gaab tɔɔgse se 'tɛɗn Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi. Ɔn̰te jeki nakŋ kɛn daa rose ɓo dɔŋɔ gɛn tɛɗn nakŋ maakse jea.
45014001	Gɛnaamge, jee maakjege tun kɛn ɔk tɔɔgɔ do ɗoobm al‑Masi ki ey se, ɔkɗeki jiga. Ɔn̰te kɔjki bɔɔrɔ do nakge tun naaɗe lee saapin̰ se.
45014002	Maam je m'asen taaɗa taa nakgen jeege lee ɔsɔ. Jee mɛtin̰ge se saap ɔɔ ɔk ɗoobo gɛn kɔsn nakgen ɓaa se paac. Num jee mɛtin̰gen ɔk tɔɔgɔ ɗoobm Mɛljege tu ey se, ɔs daa eyo, naɓo lee ɔs kamb zɛɛrɛ sum.
45014003	Debm ɔs daa se, ɔn̰te kaakŋ gɛnaan̰ kɛn ɔs ey se aan gɔɔ debm naan̰ aalin̰ maak eyo; ɔɔ debm ɔs daa ey se, ɔn̰te kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do gɛnaan̰ kɛn ɔs daa se. Taa naaɗe paac se, Raa ɔkɗega jiga.
45014004	Naai ara tap ɓo naŋa, jaay kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ ro deb kɛn tɛɗ naaba nam ki se? Kɛn naan̰ jaay tɛɗ jig ey lɛ mɛlin̰ ɓo an̰ kaaka. Ɔɔ naan̰ se ɗaar tɔɔgɔ, taa Mɛlin̰ Raa se ɔk tɔɔgɔ kɛn an̰ kɔkin̰ naan̰ 'kɔŋ kooc eyo.
45014005	Naan Raa ki se, jee mɛtin̰ge saap ɔɔ ɓiigen mɛtin̰ge se cir ɓiigen kuuy; num gaŋ jee mɛtin̰gen kuuy se, taaɗ ɔɔ naan Raa ki se, ɓiige paac aas kaasa. Bin se, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo tɛɗn aan gɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jeelin̰ maakin̰ ki mala mala.
45014006	Debm saap ɔɔ ɓii mɛtin̰ge cir kɛngen kuuy se, ute saapin̰ se naan̰ nook Mɛljege. Debm kɛn ɔs daa se, naan̰ kic tɛɗin̰ gɛn nookŋ Mɛljege, taa kɛn naan̰ ɓaa kɔsɔ se, tɔɔm Raa. Debm kɛn baate kɔsn daa se kic, naan̰ tɛɗin̰ gɛn nookŋ Mɛljege, taa naan̰ kic ɓo tɔɔm Raa.
45014007	'Jeelki, maakjege tu se, nam tap ɓo iŋg gɛn don̰ eyo ɔɔ nam tap ɓo ooy gɛn don̰ ey kici.
45014008	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, kɛn j'utu j'iŋgki zɛɛrɛ lɛ, naaje j'iŋgki gɛn Mɛljege. Ɔɔ kɛn j'aki kooy kic ɓo, j'aki kooy gɛn Mɛljege. Kɛn j'utuki zɛɛrɛ lɔ j'ooykiga kooyo, naajege se k'gɛn Mɛljege.
45014009	Taa al‑Masi se ooyga ɔɔ duroga daan yoge tu ɔɔ naan̰ ɓo Mɛl jee utu iŋg zɛɛrɛ ɔɔ Mɛl jee ooyga kooy kici.
45014010	Naai tap ɓo naŋa jaay ɔj bɔɔrɔ do gɛnaai ki se? Ɔɔ tɛr naai tap ɓo naŋa jaay aal gɛnaai maak ki ey se? 'Jeelki, naajege paac se j'utu j'aki ɓaa naan Raa kɛn utu ajeki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dojege tu.
45014011	Taa naan̰ se ɓo Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Maam se, m'Raa zɛɛrɛ ɔɔ jeege paac utu 'ɓaa kɛrgŋ naanum ki ɔɔ naaɗe paac utu am nookŋ maam Raa.
45014012	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo naan̰ malin̰ ɓo 'ɓaa taaɗn taarin̰ naan Raa ki.
45014013	Bin se, j'ɔn̰te kɔjki bɔɔrɔ do naapge tu. Naase ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki nakŋ kɛn 'tɛɗ gɛnaase 'koocn̰ ɗoobm al‑Masi ki ey lɛ kɛn an̰ gaasn gɛn tɛɗn bɛɛ.
45014014	Anum aan gɔɔ maam te Mɛljege Isa k'tɛɗga kalaŋ se, maam m'jeel maakum ki, nakŋ kɔsn jaay kɛn tuj debkilimi naan Raa ki se, gɔtɔ. Num kɛn debm jaay aak nakŋ kɔs se aan gɔɔ nakŋ an̰ tujn̰ naan Raa ki num, ɔn̰te kɔsɔ.
45014015	Kɛn taa kɔsɔ jaay naai tujn̰ maakŋ gɛnaai se, kɛse naai ɔk maakje don̰ ki eyo. 'Jeele, al‑Masi se ooyga taa naan̰a, bin num taa kɔsɔ se, ɔn̰te 'kutn gɛnaai.
45014016	Nakŋ kɛn naai saap ɔɔ jiga se, ɔn̰ jee kuuy kic ɓo an̰ kaakin̰ aan gɔɔ nakŋ jiga.
45014017	Maakŋ Gaar Raa se, ɔlin̰ ute nakŋ kɔsɔ ɔɔ ute kaay eyo. Num maakŋ Gaar Raa se je nakŋ ute ɗoobin̰a, lapia ɔɔ maak‑raapm kɛn Nirl Salal lee ɛɗ jeege tu.
45014018	Debm ɗoobm al‑Masi ki jaay tɛɗn naabm ese se, naan̰ tɔɔl Raa ki ɔɔ jeege paac tɔɔmin̰a.
45014019	Bin num j'aayki kaamjege gɛn je lapia ute naapa; k'tɛɗki nakŋ kɛn ajeki noogo j'aki ziiɗn ɓaa ute naanjege ɗoobm al‑Masi ki.
45014020	Taa kɔsɔ se, ɔn̰te tujn̰ naabm Raa. Ɗeere, nakŋ kɔsn tuj debkilimi naan Raa ki se gɔtɔ, naɓo taa kɔs sum ɓo, 'tɛɗ gɛnaai 'koocn̰ ɗoobm al‑Masi ki num, ɔn̰te kɔsn kɔsn se.
45014021	Bɛɛki se, nam ɔn̰te tɛɗ nakŋ kɛn 'tɛɗ gɛnaan̰ koocn̰ ɗoobm al‑Masi ki: taa naan̰ se ɓo ɔn̰te kɔsn daa, ɔn̰te kaay tɔtɔ ɔɔ ɔn̰te tɛɗn ne ɗim kuuy kɛn 'tɛɗn gɛnaai koocn̰ ɗoobm al‑Masi ki.
45014022	Nakŋ kɛn naai jeel maaki ki se, 'bɔɔbin̰a. Ɔn̰ nakŋ se 'tɛɗn daan naai ki ute Raa sum. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, debm kɛn tɛɗ naka jaay maakin̰ naaj eyo ɔɔ jeel nakŋ naan̰ tɛɗ se jaay jiga se, naan̰ se maakin̰ raap aak eyo.
45014023	Num debm tɛɗ naka jaay maakin̰ naaj do ki ɔɔ jeelin̰ nakŋ naan̰ tɛɗ se jig ey se, bɔɔrɔ utu koocn̰ don̰ ki, taa naan̰ maakin̰ naaj naaja ute naan̰ se kic ɓo naan̰ ɔs tap. Bin num nakgen k'tɛɗ paac jaay, kɛn k'jeelin̰ki maakjege tu ɔɔ k'naajki do ki ɔɔ k'tɛɗin̰kiga num, kɛse k'tɛɗkiga kusin̰a naan Raa ki.
45015001	Naajegen k'tɔɔgki ɗoobm al‑Masi ki se, k'sɛrkki gɛnaajegen ɔk tɔɔg eyo gɛn kiŋg ɗoobm Raa ki se ɔɔ j'ɔn̰te jeki nakŋ kɛn ajeki tɔɔl naajege tu sum.
45015002	Naŋa naŋa kic ɓo je nakŋ kɛn tɔɔl naapin̰ ki taa an̰ tɛɗn bɛɛ ɔɔ an̰ noogin̰ kɔkŋ ɗoobm al‑Masi se tɔɔgŋ ɓaa ute naanin̰a.
45015003	'Jeelki, al‑Masi se je te bɛɛ naan̰ mala eyo, num aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Naajn̰ kɛn k'naaji naai Raa se, kɛse k'naajum maama.
45015004	Anum taargen kɛn k'raaŋin̰o do dɔkin̰ maakŋ Kitap ki se, taa ajeki dooyo. Taargen se ɓo kɛn ajeki kɛɗn kaay kaama ɔɔ ajeki sɛl maakjege taa j'aki kɔnd dojege do Raa ki.
45015005	Ɔn̰ Raa debm kɛɗn kaay kaama ɔɔ debm sɛl jeege se, asen tɛɗn aki kiŋg dɔɔkŋ taarse kalaŋ aan gɔɔ kɛn Isa al‑Masi jen ro ki.
45015006	Bin jaay ɓo, maakse 'tɛɗn kalaŋ ɔɔ mindse kic tɛɗn kalaŋ, naase aki nookŋ Raa kɛn Bubm Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi se.
45015007	Anum ɔkki naapa jiga aan gɔɔ kɛn al‑Masi ɔksen naase jiga se. Bin se aki kɔl jeege 'nookŋ Raa.
45015008	'Ɓooyki m'asen taaɗa: al‑Masi jaay ɓaaɗo tɛɗ debm tɛɗn naabm Yaudge se, taa nakŋ kɛn Raa taaɗo ɓugŋ Yaudge tu ɔɔ utu aɗen tɛɗ se, naan̰ tɛɗɗesin̰ga ute ɗoobin̰a ɔɔ kɛse je aɗen taaɗn ɔɔ Raa se naan̰ tuj ɔrmin̰ eyo.
45015009	Ɔɔ naan̰ ɓaaɗo se, taa jeegen kɛn Yaudge ey kic ɓo nookŋ Raa taa bɛɛn̰a aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Taa naan̰ se ɓo, maakŋ jeege tun Yaudge ey se, maam m'utu m'ai tɔɔmɔ; ɔɔ maam m'utu m'kaar kaa taa m'nookŋ roi.
45015010	Tɛr Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Naasen jee ɓaa se paac se 'tɛɗki maak‑raapo ute jee kɛn Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗenga tɔɔɗɔ ɔɔ naaɗe tɛɗga jee naan̰ge se.
45015011	Ɔɔ tɛr daala Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Naasen paacn̰ kɛn Yaudge ey se, 'tɔɔmki Mɛljege Raa ɔɔ ɔn̰ jeegen ɓaa se paac, an̰ nooko.
45015012	Ɔɔ tɛr debm taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki ron̰ Ezayi kic taaɗga daala ɔɔ: Deba utu aɗe teecn̰ mɛtjil Jɛsɛ ki se ɔɔ naan̰ se utu aɗe ɓaa kɔsn gaara do jeege tu paac ɔɔ mɛtjil jeegen do naaŋ ki paac utu kɔnd doɗe don̰ ki.
45015013	Ɔn̰ Raa kɛn tɛɗ jeege ɔnd doɗe don̰ ki ɔɔ kɛn naase aalki maakse don̰ ki se, asen kɛɗn maak‑raap dɛna ute lapia. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, ute tɔɔgŋ Nirl Salal se, naase aki kɔnd dose paac don̰ ki.
45015014	Gɛnaamge, maakum ki se maam m'jeele naase se jeegen kɛn lee tɛɗ nakgen bɛɛ. Ɔɔ taar mɛt ki se kic, naase 'jeel ɔkkiga mɛtin̰a. Ɔɔ naase se, aaskiga gɛn dɛjn̰ naapa.
45015015	Naɓo maakŋ maktub kɛn m'raaŋsen ese se, nakgen mɛtin̰ge se maam m'taaɗsenoga mɛtin̰ tal, taa naase aki saapm do nakge tun kɛn naase 'jeelin̰kiga jeele. Ɔɔ kɛn ɔlum jaay m'taaɗsen mɛtn nakgen se tal se, taa bɛɛ Raa kɛn tɛɗum se,
45015016	m'tɛɗga debm tɛɗn naabm Isa al‑Masi daan jeege tun Yaudge eyo. Maam m'ɛɗ rom paac gɛn taaɗn Labar Jiga gɛn Raa se jeege tu, taa jee Yaudge ey se kic ɓo 'kaal maakɗe don̰ ki ɔɔ bin se, naaɗe tɛɗn gɔɔ sɛrkŋ kɛn tɔɔl Raa ki. Ɔɔ kɛn tɛɗɗe jaay naaɗe tɛɗ jee Raage se, kɛse Nirl Salal.
45015017	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, maam kɛn m'tɛɗga kalaŋ ute Isa al‑Masi se, maakum raap do naabum kɛn maam m'tɛɗ Raa ki.
45015018	Anum maam se m'je m'kuun maan ɗim ey sum, num m'je ɓo m'taaɗn nakŋ kɛn al‑Masi tɛɗ ute ɗoobm maama kɛn taa jeegen Yaudge ey se tookŋ taar Raa. Ɔɔ naabm se, naan̰ tɛɗin̰ ute naabum kɛn maam m'tɛɗa ɔɔ ute taarum kɛn maam m'taaɗa,
45015019	ɔɔ ute tɔɔgŋ Nirl Salal se, naan̰ ɔlum m'tɛɗn nakŋ‑kɔɔɓge ute nakgen deel doa. Bin ɓo gɔtɔ ɓaa se paac, maam m'taaɗga Labar Jigan gɛn al‑Masi se paac jeege tu, m'baago maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Jeruzalɛm ki bini m'aan taa naaŋ kɛn Iliri ki.
45015020	Naɓo maam se daayum m'je taaɗn Labar Jigan gɛn Isa al‑Masi se, gɔtn kɛn k'taaɗ te ro al‑Masi ey ɓɔrtɔ. Anum jee kɛn booyga booy taar gɛn jee dooygen kuuy se, maam m'je m'ɓaa gɔtn ese ey sum, taa maam se m'je tɛɗn naab eyo do naabm gɛn deb kuuy ki.
45015021	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, maam m'tɛɗ aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗa: Jee kɛn booy j'ɔɔsɗe te maanin̰ ey se, naaɗe utu an̰ kaaka. Ɔɔ jeegen kɛn booy te taarin̰ ey se lɛ, naaɗe utu booy kɔkŋ taarin̰a.
45015022	Kɛse ɓo nakŋ gaasumga ɗoobo mɛt dɛna gɛn ɓaa gɔtse ki.
45015023	Anum ɓɔrse jaay ɓo, naabum gɔtn ara se naŋga. Ey num m'ɔkga ɓaara dɛna kɛn maam m'je m'ɓaa gɔtse ki, naɓo m'ɔŋ te ɗoob eyo.
45015024	Anum kɛn maam jaay m'ɓaa taa naaŋ Espan̰ ki se, maam m'kaal gɔtse ki. Ɗeere, kɛn am kɔlum m'ɓaa gɔtse ki se, taa m'asen ɓaa kaak jaay am tɔɔlɔ ɔɔ kɛn maam jaay m'aanga gɔtse ki se, m'tiŋg cɔkɔ jaay ɓo sɔm amki noogŋ gɛn ɓaa taa naaŋ Espan̰ ki.
45015025	Num ɓɔrse se, maam m'ɓaa ɓaa maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Jeruzalɛm ki taa ɓaa noogŋ jee Raagen gɔtn naane.
45015026	Taa jee al‑Masigen taa naaŋ Masedoan ki ute kɛngen taa naaŋ Akayi ki se, uuno doa gɛn tusn naka gɛn noogŋ jee Raagen Jeruzalɛm ki jaay ɔk ɗim ey se.
45015027	Ɗeere, naaɗe se malin̰ge ɓo uuno doa taa aɗe noogo. Kɛn ɗeer se, naaɗe kic ɔk sɛɛ doɗe ki, taa Yaudge se noogoga jee kɛn Yaudge ey se gɛn kɔŋ bɛɛ Raa. Bin num jeegen Yaudge ey se, naaɗe noogŋ Yaudge ute maalɗe kici.
45015028	Kɛn naabm se jaay m'naŋin̰ga ɔɔ nakse jaay ɓaa m'ɛɗin̰ga gɛnaage tun Jeruzalɛm ki se, maam m'utu m'ɓaa taa naaŋ Espan̰ ki ɔɔ maam m'utu m'kaal gɔtse ki kici.
45015029	Maam m'jeele, ɓii kɛn m'kaan gɔtse ki se, al‑Masi asen tɛɗn bɛɛn̰ dɛn aak eyo.
45015030	Gɛnaamge, 'booyki m'asen taaɗa: aan gɔɔ naajege j'aalki maakjege do Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi ki ɔɔ ute maak‑je kɛn Nirl Salal ɛɗjeki do naapge tu se, aayki kaamse 'ɗoki gɛn tɔnd mɛtn Raa taa maama.
45015031	'Tɔndki mɛtn Raa kɛn maam jaay m'aanga taa naaŋ Jude ki num, jee kɛn aal maakɗe do Isa al‑Masi ki ey se, am dabar eyo. Ɔɔ tɛr 'tɔndki mɛtn Raa taa nakŋ kɛn maam m'ɓaa kɛɗn jee Raage tun maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Jeruzalɛm ki se, nakŋ se naaɗe an̰ kɔkin̰ jiga aɗen tɛɗn bɛɛ.
45015032	Bin ɓo, kɛn Raa jaay je num, maam m'utu m'ɓaa gɔtse ki ute maak‑raapo ɔɔ kɛn m'aanga naane se, m'utu m'ɓaa tɔɔl maakuma.
45015033	Ɔn̰ Raa debm kɛɗn lapia jeege tu se, 'kiŋg ute naase paac. Amin.
45016001	Maam m'ɔlsen gɛnaajegen mɛnd kɛn ron̰ Pɛbɛ, naan̰ se mɛnd mɛc ɔɔ tɛɗn naabm Raa maakŋ egliz kɛn maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Sankre ki.
45016002	Kɛn naan̰ aan ɔŋsega num, aan gɔɔ jee Raagen lee ɔk naapa jiga se, naase kic ɔkin̰ki jiga bin kici. Maakŋ naabin̰ kɛn naan̰ je tɛɗ paac se aakin̰ki jaay ɗim baatin̰ga num 'noogin̰ki. Taa naan̰ se noogoga jeege dɛna ɔɔ maam mala kic, naan̰ noogumga.
45016003	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Priska ki ute gaabin̰ Akilas ki. Naaɗe se tɛɗ naabm Isa al‑Masi ute maam kalaŋ.
45016004	Naaɗe mala kic ɓo jeɗo kutn koɗe taa am kaaja. Taa nakŋ naaɗe tɛɗo ese se, maam m'kalum ki sum ɓo m'tɔɔmɗe eyo, num eglizge paacn̰ maakŋ taa naaŋge tun malin̰ge Yaudge ey se kic ɓo tɔɔmɗe.
45016005	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ eglizn kɛn lee tus ɓeeɗe ki se kici. 'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ mɛɗn dom Epaynɛt ki. Taa naaŋ Azi ki se, naan̰ ɓo debm aal maakin̰ deet do al‑Masi ki.
45016006	Mari kɛn tɛɗga naaba dɛn taa naase se kic, 'tɛɗin̰ki tɔɔsɛ.
45016007	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Andronikus ki ute Junias ki. Naaɗe se taasumge ɔɔ k'tɔkjeno daŋgay ki kalaŋ kici. Naaɗe se jee kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masigen k'jeel jeel gɔtɗe. Ɔɔ naaɗe aalo maakɗe do Isa al‑Masi ki se, deet naan maam ki.
45016008	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Ampliatus ki. Ɗoobm Mɛljege tu se, naan̰ mɛɗn doma.
45016009	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Urban ki. Naan̰ se debm kɛn k'tɛɗn naabm al‑Masi kalaŋ se. Ɔɔ Stakis kɛn mɛɗn dom se kic, 'tɛɗin̰ki tɔɔsɛ.
45016010	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Apɛlɛsn kɛn ɔk ɗoobm al‑Masi ɔɔn̰ se. Ɔɔ 'tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ jee maakŋ ɓee Aristobul ki kici.
45016011	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ taasum Ɛrɔdion ki. Ɔɔ jee maakŋ ɓee Narsis kɛn aal maakɗe do Mɛljege tu se kic 'tɛɗɗeki tɔɔsɛ.
45016012	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Tripen ute Tripoz ki, mɛndgen se tɛɗoga naaba dɛna Mɛljege tu. 'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ gɛnaam kɛn mɛnd kɛn ron̰ Persid kɛn maam jen̰ ɗoobm al‑Masi ki se. Naan̰ kic tɛɗga naaba dɛn aak eyo Mɛljege tu.
45016013	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Rupus ki, naan̰ kɛn Mɛljege bɛɛr ɔɔɗin̰ga kɔɔɗ se. Ɔɔ 'tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ kon̰ ki ɔɔ kon̰ se tɛɗn aan gɔɔ ko maam kici.
45016014	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Asynkrit ki, Plegon ki, Ermes ki, Patrobas ki, Ermas ute gɛnaan̰gen ute naan̰ se kici.
45016015	'Tɛɗki tɔɔsɛ Pilolog ute Juli ki ɔɔ Nere ki ute gɛnaan̰ mɛnd Ɔlympas ɔɔ jee Raagen paacn̰ utu iŋg te naaɗe se kici.
45016016	Kɛn 'ɓaaki ɓaa tɛɗn tɔɔsɛ se, 'baam 'tɔkki naapa ɔɔ aayki ciil naapge. Eglizgen paacn̰ gɛn al‑Masi kɛn gɔtn ara se, tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ.
45016017	Gɛnaamge, 'booyki m'asen taaɗa: ɔndki kɔndɔ ute jee kɛn gaaŋ jeege ɔɔ iig jeege ɗoobm al‑Masi ki se. Jee se taar kɛn k'dooyse jaay naase 'tookki do ki se, naaɗe se, took do ki eyo. Ɔɔɗki dose dɔkɔ roɗe ki!
45016018	Taa jee se naaɗe tɛɗn naabm Mɛljege al‑Masi eyo, num naaɗe saap ɓo do maakɗe ki sum. Naaɗe lee taaɗɗen taar nijim ute taargen kɛn tɔɔl jeege tu ɔɔ ute taargen se naaɗe lee dɛrl jeege kɛn jeel mɛt nakgen ese se eyo.
45016019	Jeege paac jeele, naase se 'tookki taar Mɛljege. Taa naase se maam maakum raap aak eyo. Maam m'jese naase aki tɛɗn jee jeel‑taarge gɛn jeel tɛɗn bɛɛ, ɔɔ bɛɛ ese se, kusin̰ cɔkɔ kic ɓo ɔn̰te deepmsin̰ki.
45016020	Raa kɛn debm kɛɗn lapia jeege tu se, ɔɔpga baata Ɓubm sitange se naan̰ utu aan̰o tɛrɛcn̰ tɔɔgin̰ mɛtn jɛse ki. Ɔn̰ Mɛljege Isa se asen tɛɗn bɛɛn̰a.
45016021	Timote kɛn k'tɛɗn naaba kalaŋ se tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ. Ɔɔ Lusius, Jason ɔɔ Sosipater kɛn taasumge se kic, tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ.
45016022	Ɔɔ maam Tɛrtius, kɛn Pɔl ɔlum raaŋ maktubm ara se kic, m'tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ ute ro Mɛljegen kɛn tumjekiga k'tɛɗkiga kalaŋ se.
45016023	Gayus kic ɓo tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ; maam Pɔl se, naan̰ ɓo debm kɛn ɔkum ɓeen̰ ki ɔɔ jee egliz ki kic ɓo lee tus gɔtin̰ ki kici. Ɛrastn kɛn debm bɔɔb gursn gɛn gɛgɛr se kic, tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ ɔɔ Kartus gɛnaaje kic ɓo, tɛɗsen tɔɔsɛ.
45016024	[Naase paacki se, ɔn̰ Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi asen tɛɗn bɛɛn̰a. Amin.]
45016025	K'tɔɔmki Raa! Taa Raa se naan̰ ɔk tɔɔgɔ ɔɔ ute Labar Jigan gɛn Isa al‑Masi kɛn maam m'lee taaɗ jeege tu se, asen tɛɗn naase aki kɔkŋ ɗoobm al‑Masi se tɔɔgɔ. Taa do dɔkin̰ se mɛtn taar se, Raa taaɗ te mɛtin̰ jeege tu eyo,
45016026	num ɓɔrse ute taargen kɛn jee taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki raaŋo do dɔkin̰ se, naan̰ taaɗga mɛtn taar se tooɗga tal. Bin ɓo Raa kɛn Daayum se ɔl k'taaɗga mɛtin̰ jeege tun ɓaa se paac taa naaɗe kic paac kɔŋ ɗoobm gɛn tookŋ kaal maakɗe don̰ ki ɔɔ tookŋ taarin̰a.
45016027	'Tɔɔmki Raa kɛn kalin̰ ki sum ɓo debm jeel‑taara se, ɔɔ daayum daayum k'nookin̰ki ute ro Isa al‑Masi! Amin.
46001001	Kɛn ara maam Pɔl ɓo m'raaŋsen maktubm se ute gɛnaajege Sostɛn. Maam se Raa ɓo daŋumo gɛn tɛɗn debm kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masi aan gɔɔ kɛn naan̰ maakin̰ jen ro ki.
46001002	Maktubm se, maam m'raaŋsesin̰ naase jee egliz kɛn gɛn Raa kɛn maakŋ gɛgɛr kɛn Kɔrint ki. Ute ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi se, Raa tɛɗsenga tɛɗkiga jee salal. Ɔɔ Raa daŋseno se, taa aki tɛɗn jee naan̰ge ute jee gɔtn ɓaa se paacn̰ kɛn lee eem ro Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi. Isa se naan̰ ɓo Mɛlɗe ɔɔ Mɛl naajege kici.
46001003	Ɔn̰ Bubjege Raa ute Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi asen tɛɗn bɛɛɗe ɔɔ asen kɛɗn lapia.
46001004	Daayum maam m'tɔɔm Raa taa naase, taa bɛɛ kɛn naan̰ tɛɗseni ute ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi se.
46001005	Ɗeere, dɔɔkŋ kɛn naase 'dɔɔkkiga tɛɗkiga kalaŋ ute al‑Masi se, Raa ɛɗsenga nakgen bɛɛ dɛn aak eyo, kɛn tap ki se tɛɗsenga 'jeelkiga taaɗn Taar Raa ɔɔ ɛɗsenga jeel nakge paac.
46001006	Taar kɛn naaje k'taaɗsen gɛn al‑Masi jaay naase 'booyki sum se, naase ɔkin̰kiga maakse ki tɔɔgɔ.
46001007	Bin ɓo, nakgen paacn̰ kɛn Raa ɛɗ jeen̰ge tu se, naase kic ɔŋkiga naasen kɛn iŋg aakki kaak kaam Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi kɛn utu aɗe teecn̰ naanse ki pirsil se.
46001008	Raa se naan̰ ɓo debm kɛn asen kɛɗn tɔɔgɔ bini aki kaan do taar tɔɔlin̰ ki. Bin ɓo ɓii kɛn Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi aɗe ɓaa se, j'kɔŋ ne ɗim aak kus rose ki eyo.
46001009	Ɗeere, Raa se naan̰ tuj ɔrmin̰ eyo, naan̰ ɓo debm kɛn daŋseno, taa aki tum tɛɗn kalaŋ ute Goonin̰ Isa al‑Masi kɛn Mɛljege se.
46001010	Ɓɔrse gɛnaamge, ute ro Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi se, m'eemsen nɔɔ mɛtse ki m'ɔɔ: ɔn̰te 'tɔpki naapa, naɓo naase 'paacki ɔkki taarse kalaŋ. 'Tumki ute naapa, ɔn̰ki maakse 'tɛɗn kalaŋ ɔɔ saapse kic ɓo ɔn̰in̰ki 'tɛɗn kalaŋ.
46001011	Ɗeere gɛnaamgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, jee maakŋ ɓee Klɔɛ ki ɓaaɗo taaɗum ɔɔ maakŋ kiŋgse ki se, naase se taarse ɔk mɛtn naap eyo.
46001012	Num do taar kɛn se ɓo, maam m'je m'asen taaɗn mɛtin̰a: maakse ki se, deb kalaŋ taaɗ ɔɔ: maam se m'debm Pɔl, debm kuuy ɗeek ɔɔ: maam se m'debm Apɔlɔs, ɔɔ debm kuuy taaɗ ɔɔ: maam se m'debm Piɛr, ɔɔ debm kuuy kic ɗeek ɔɔ: maam se lɛ m'debm al‑Masi.
46001013	'Saapki tu al‑Masi se, j'an̰ kɔŋ nigŋ ne? Maam Pɔl ɓo kɛn k'tup k'tɔɔlum ro kaag ki taa naase se la? Lɔ k'batizseno se ute ro maam m'Pɔl la?
46001014	Maam m'tɔɔm Raa, taa maakse ki se, jeegen maam m'batizɗeno se, Krispus ute Gayus sum.
46001015	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, nam maakse ki se 'kɔŋ ɗeekŋ ɔɔ naase se k'batizseno ute ro maam Pɔl.
46001016	Waay, tɛɗumga dirigi. Ɗeere, maam m'batizoga jee maakŋ ɓee Stepanas ki kici. M'jeel ey jaay ey num m'batizo te nam kuuy ey sum.
46001017	Taa al‑Masi se, ɔlumo gɛn batizn jeege eyo, num gɛn taaɗn Labarin̰ Jiga se ɓo jeege tu. Ɔɔ taarin̰ se, maam m'an̰ taaɗn ute taar nijim kɛn jeege booyin̰ aan gɔɔ gɛn debm jeel‑taar lee taaɗ se eyo, taa kɛn maam jaay taaɗ ute jeel‑taar gɛn jikilimge sum num kooy al‑Masi ro kaag ki se, 'tɛɗn nakŋ cɛrɛ.
46001018	Ɗeere, jee iig kiig se, taar kɛn k'taaɗn gɛn Isan ooy do kaag ki se, kɛse naaɗe aakin̰ aan gɔɔ taar jee dɛrlge. Num gaŋ naajegen j'aajki kaaj se lɛ, taar se ɓo kɛn taaɗjeki tɔɔgŋ Raa.
46001019	Taa maakŋ Kitap ki se Raa taaɗ ɔɔ: Jee jeel‑taarge se, jeel‑taarɗe se maam m'utu m'an̰ ɗaara; ɔɔ mɛtɛkɗege se lɛ, maam m'utu m'an̰ tɛɗin̰ 'tɛɗn gɔtɔ.
46001020	Bin num gɔtn se jee jeel‑taarge se, tap ɓo taaɗn ɔɔ ɗi? Ɔɔ jee jeel taaɗ tɔɔkŋ mɛtn Ko Taar Raage se kic ɓo taaɗn ɔɔ ɗi? Ɔɔ jee jeel ɗoobm taaɗn taargen maakŋ duni kɛn ɓɔrse se taaɗn ɔɔ ɗi daala? Taa Raa se, jeel‑taar gɛn jikilimgen ɔk se, naan̰ tɛɗin̰ tɛɗga nakŋ jee dɛrlge.
46001021	Ɗeere, jikilimge, ute jeel‑taar kɛn naaɗe ɔk paac se kic ɓo, jeel‑taar Raa se naaɗe ɔŋ jeel ɔk te mɛtin̰ eyo. Taa naan̰ se ɓo, Raa uunoga doa gɛn kaajn̰ jee kɛn aal maakɗe do Labar Jigan kɛn k'lee k'taaɗɗen se ɔɔ taar se jee kuuy aakin̰ aan gɔɔ taar jee dɛrlge.
46001022	Jeegen Yaudge se je kaakŋ nakŋ‑kɔɔɓgen iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki ɔɔ jee Grɛkge se lɛ, naaɗe je ɗoobm kɛn an jeel‑taara.
46001023	Gaŋ naaje se, k'taaɗ jeege tu j'ɔɔ al‑Masi kɛn Raa taaɗn se ɓo k'tup k'tɔɔlin̰ ro kaag ki: kɛse ɓo taar kɛn tuj maakŋ Yaudge ɔɔ jeegen Yaudge ey se lɛ aakin̰ taar ese se, taar jee dɛrlge.
46001024	Num gaŋ jee kɛn Raa daŋɗeno maakŋ Yaudge tu ey lɛ maakŋ Grɛkge tu se, gɛn naaɗe ki se, al‑Masi se naan̰ ɓo tɔɔgŋ Raa ɔɔ jeel‑taar gɛn Raa ki kici.
46001025	Taa nakŋ kɛn Raa tɛɗ jaay jeege aakin̰ aan gɔɔ nakŋ jee dɛrlge se, ute naan̰ se kic ɓo, naan̰ jeel‑taara cir jeel‑taar jikilimge ɔɔ nakŋ Raa tɛɗ jaay jeege aakin̰ aan gɔɔ naan̰ ɔk tɔɔg ey se lɛ, naan̰ tɔɔg cir tɔɔgŋ jikilimge.
46001026	Gɛnaamgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, 'saapki tu kaaɗ kɛn Raa daŋseno se kɛn gɛn jikilimge tu sum num, maakse ki se naase ɔkki jee jeel‑taarge se, dɛn eyo. Ɔɔ jee tɔɔg kic ɓo, naase ɔkki dɛn eyo. Ɔɔ jeegen k'jeel jeel gɔtɗe maakŋ ɓeeɗege tu kic ɓo naase ɔkki dɛn eyo.
46001027	Anum Raa se bɛɛr tɔɔɗo jeegen kɛn jikilimge aakɗen aan gɔɔ jee dɛrlge se ɓo taa 'kɔl jee jeel‑taarge se, sɔkɔn̰ɔ aɗen tɔɔlɔ; ɔɔ jeegen kɛn jikilimge aakɗen aan gɔɔ jeegen ɔk tɔɔg ey se, Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗɗeno se taa 'kɔl jeegen ɔk tɔɔgɔ se, sɔkɔn̰ɔ aɗen tɔɔlɔ.
46001028	Raa bɛɛr tɔɔɗo jeegen kɛn jikilimge aakɗen jeegen tɔɔl sɛr eyo, j'aalɗen maak ki eyo ɔɔ j'aakɗen aan gɔɔ nakŋ gɔtɔ se, bin ɓo ute ɗoobm naaɗe se, jee kɛn tɛɗ roɗe magal magal se, Raa aɗen tɛɗn naaɗe se 'tɛɗn jee rɛn̰ rɛn̰.
46001029	Raa tɛɗn naan̰ se taa nam nam 'kɔŋ tɔɔm ron̰ naanin̰ ki eyo.
46001030	Ɗeere, naase se Raa dɔɔksenga ute Isa al‑Masi ɔɔ jeel‑taar naajegen kɛn iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki se, naan̰ ɓo al‑Masi se. Ɔɔ al‑Masi se naan̰ ɓo tɛɗjekiga k'tɛɗkiga jeegen aak bɛɛ naan Raa ki ɔɔ bɛɛr tɔɔɗjekiga k'tɛɗkiga jee naan̰ge ɔɔ naan̰ ɔɔɗjekiga dojege maakŋ kusin̰ ki.
46001031	Taa naan̰ se ɓo Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Debm jaay je tɔɔm ron̰ num, n̰'tɔɔm ron̰ do nakge tun Mɛljege tɛɗa.
46002001	Gɛnaamge, kɛn maam jaay m'iŋgo gɔtse ki taa m'asen taaɗn nakŋ kɛn Raa ɔyin̰ga kɔy taaɗ te mɛtin̰ jeege tu ey se, maakŋ taarumge tu se, maam m'taaɗsen te taargen ɔɔn̰ɔ ɔɔn̰ eyo ɔɔ ute jeel taargen deel do eyo.
46002002	Num maakse ki se, maam m'uunoga doa m'je jeel ɗim kuuy eyo, nakŋ kɛn maam m'je jeel se, Isa al‑Masi ɔɔ Isa al‑Masi se ɓo k'tup k'tɔɔlin̰ ro kaag ki se.
46002003	Kɛn maam m'iŋgo gɔtse ki se, maam m'naam m'ɔk rom se tɔɔgum baata, maam m'ɓeere ɔkuma ɔɔ rom ook marga jɛg jɛg.
46002004	Taar kɛn maam m'taaɗseni ute dooy kɛn maam m'dooyseno se, m'taaɗsesin̰o se ute jeel‑taara kɛn jikilimge lee taaɗin̰ nijim se eyo, num gaŋ maakŋ taar kɛn maam m'taaɗsen se, kɛse Nirl Raa ɓo taaɗ tɔɔgin̰a.
46002005	Bin ɓo, kaal maakŋ naase aalki se, 'tɛɗn do jeel‑taar jikilimge tu eyo, num do tɔɔgŋ Raa ki.
46002006	Anum kɛse ɓo jeel‑taar kɛn naaje k'dooy jee al‑Masigen kɛn jeel ɔkga kɔk ɗoobm Mɛljege. Jeel‑taar ese se gɛn do duni ara ute jeegen ɔk tɔɔgŋ iŋg do jeege tun do duni ki ara ki eyo, naaɗe se ɓo kɛn utu 'kut se.
46002007	Naaje k'dooy jeege ute jeel‑taar Raa ese se kɛn jikilimge jeel mɛtin̰ eyo taa taar se Raa ɔyɗesin̰oga kɔyo. Ey num Raa se kaaɗ kɛn naan̰ aalo te do naaŋ ey ɓɔrt se ɓo, naan̰ uunoga kuun doa taa ajeki kɛɗn jeel‑taarin̰a gɛn kɛnd maakŋ nookin̰ ki.
46002008	Ɔɔ jeel‑taar se maakŋ magalge tun iŋg do jeege tu se nam kalaŋ tap ɓo booy ɔk te mɛtin̰ eyo. Ey num kɛn naaɗe jaay booy ɔkoga kɔk mɛtin̰ num, Mɛljegen k'nookin̰ se, naaɗe an̰ kɔŋ tupm tɔɔl ro kaag ki eyo.
46002009	Num gaŋ aan gɔɔ kɛn Kitap taaɗa: Nakŋ se nam ɓii kalaŋ aakin̰ te ute kaamin̰ eyo ɔɔ booyin̰ te ute bin̰ eyo ɔɔ nam saap aan te do ki ey kici, nakgen se Raa tɔnd ɗaapin̰oga ɗaap jeege tun jen̰a.
46002010	Ɗeere, nakgen se te ɗoobm Nirl Raa se, Raa taaɗjekiga mɛtin̰ tooɗga tal. Taa Nirl Salal se jeel naŋ nakge paac bini nakŋ maakŋ maak‑saap Raa ki kici.
46002011	Saapm debkilimi se tap ɓo, naŋa jeele? Gɔtɔ! Kɛn jeel saapm debkilimi se, naan̰ malin̰ sum. Ɔɔ Raa kic ɓo nam jeel saapin̰ eyo; kɛn jeel saapin̰ se, Nirl naan̰ malin̰ sum.
46002012	Anum Nirl naajege k'j'ɔkki se gɛn do duni ara ki eyo, num Nirl kɛn naajege k'j'ɔkki se iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki. Ute naan̰ se ɓo naajege k'jeelki bɛɛ kɛn Raa tɛɗjeki ute maraadin̰ se.
46002013	Taargen naaje k'taaɗ jeege tu se, ute jeel‑taar kɛn jikilimge lee dooy jeege se eyo, naɓo naaje se k'dooy jeege ute jeel‑taar kɛn Nirl Raa ɛɗjeni. Naaje k'taaɗ mɛtn nakgen iin̰o gɔtn Nirl Raa ki jeege tun kɛn ɔk Nirl ese se.
46002014	Goon debkilim ɔnd don̰ do saapm naan̰ malin̰ ki sum se, 'kɔŋ tookŋ do nak kɛn iin̰o gɔtn Nirl Raa ki eyo. Naan̰ aakin̰ aan gɔɔ nakŋ jee dɛrlge ɔɔ naan̰ lɛ, ɔŋ aasin̰ gɛn booy kɔkŋ mɛtin̰ eyo, taa nakgen bin se, Nirl Raa kalin̰ ki sum ɓo 'taaɗn tɔɔkŋ mɛtin̰ jeege tu.
46002015	Num gaŋ debm ɔk Nirl Raa se, naan̰ aak ɔk mɛtn nakge paac. Ɔɔ naan̰ malin̰ lɛ, nam kuuy an̰ kɔŋ kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ don̰ ki eyo.
46002016	Aan gɔɔ Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Saapm Mɛljege se tap ɓo naŋa jeele ɔɔ naŋa tap ɓo dɛjin̰oga? Anum naajege se j'ɔkki saapm gɛn al‑Masi se maakjege tu.
46003001	Ɗeere gɛnaamge, maam m'ɔŋ m'aasin̰ te eyo kɛn m'taaɗsen taaɗn naase ki aan gɔɔ jee kɛn ɔk Nirl Raa. Naase se iŋgki aan gɔɔ jee do duni ki ɔɔ aan gɔɔ gaangen sɛɛmɛ kɛn ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, taa naan̰ se ɓo maam m'taaɗseni.
46003002	Maam se m'ɛɗseno kɔsn deer eyo, naɓo m'ɛɗseno si sum. Taa kɔsn deer se, naase an̰ki kɔŋ kaas eyo. Ɔɔ ɓɔrse kic ɓo m'jeele, naase an̰ki kɔŋ kaasn gɛn kɔsn kɔsn kɛn deer se eyo,
46003003	taa naase se iŋgki aan gɔɔ jee do duni ki. Taa naase ɔkki maak‑kilimi do naapge tu ɔɔ 'tɛɗki dɛkɛn̰ɛ ute naapa kɛse je taaɗn ɔɔ naase se iŋgki aan gɔɔ gɛn jee do duni ki, ɔɔ kiŋgse se tec aan gɔɔ gɛn jikilimgen ɓaa se paac ey ne?
46003004	Kɛn naase jaay deb kalaŋ taaɗ ɔɔ: maam ara m'debm Pɔl ɔɔ deb kuuy taaɗ ɔɔ: maam ara lɛ m'debm Apɔlɔs, nakŋ naase iŋg 'tɛɗki se, kɛse tec gɛn jikilimgen ɓaa se paac ey ne?
46003005	Apɔlɔs tap ɓo naŋa ɔɔ maam Pɔl ɓo naŋa? Naaje se k'jee tɛɗn naabm Raage sum ɔɔ ute ɗoobm naaje se ɓo, naase 'took aalkiga maakse do al‑Masi ki. Ɔɔ naaje se, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo tɛɗn naabm kɛn Mɛljege ɛɗin̰o kaam jin̰a.
46003006	Anum maam se m'ɔɔco, Apɔlɔs debm ɔɔyin̰o maane, num gaŋ debm tɛɗin̰ teep se, naan̰ Raa.
46003007	Bin ɓo debm ɔɔco ute debm kɔɔy maane se, naaɗe se paac ɔk nook eyo. Naɓo kɛn ɔk nooko cir paac se, Raa kɛn tɛɗin̰ teep se.
46003008	Debm kɔɔcɔ ute debm kɔɔy maane se, naaɗe aas kaasa ɔɔ naŋa naŋa kic ɓo Raa utu an̰ kɔgŋ dal dubar naabin̰ kɛn naan̰ tɛɗa.
46003009	Taa naaje se k'tɛɗn naaba tɛlɛ ute Raa ɔɔ naase ɓo 'tɛɗkiga aan gɔɔ maakŋ‑gɔtn gɛn Raa ɔɔ aan gɔɔ ɓee kɛn Raa utu iin̰in̰ kiin̰i.
46003010	Ute bɛɛ kɛn Raa tɛɗum se, maam m'ɔndga mɛtn ɓea aan gɔɔ debm tirɗi. Ɔɔ debm kuuy se iin̰ do ki. Naɓo naŋa naŋa kic ɓo, ɔnd kɔndɔ ute raay kɛn naan̰ 'kiin̰ do ki se.
46003011	Ɓɛrɛ, mɛtn ɓee se, j'uunga kuun mɛtin̰a. Ɔɔ nam ɔn̰te kuun mɛtn ɓee kuuy. Mɛtn ɓee kɛn maam m'taaɗsen se lɛ, Raa ɓo uuno mɛtin̰a ɔɔ mɛtn ɓee se, naan̰ ɓo Isa al‑Masi.
46003012	Do ɓee kɛn j'uun mɛtin̰ se, jee mɛtin̰ge 'kiin̰ do ki ute daab, ute pudda ɔɔ ute kogen jiga jiga ɔɔ jeegen kuuy 'kiin̰ do ki ute kaagge, ute mumburu ɔɔ ute tɔɔyɔ.
46003013	Num gaŋ ɓii kɛn Raa 'kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do jeege tu se, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo naabin̰ kɛn naan̰ tɛɗ se utu 'tooɗn tal. Taa ɓii se 'tɛɗn aan gɔɔ pooɗn kɛn ɔɔy daab nakge se ɔɔ ɓii kɛn se ɓo naŋa naŋa kic ɓo 'kaakŋ jeel naabin̰ kɛn naan̰ tɛɗo.
46003014	Debm jaay naabin̰ naan̰ tɛɗ se ɔŋ ɔs te pooɗ ey num, naan̰ se Raa an̰ kɔgŋ bɛɗin̰a.
46003015	Num debm jaay naabin̰ naan̰ tɛɗ se ɔsga pooɗo num, naan̰ se 'kiin̰ ute jin̰a. Naan̰ malin̰ se 'kɔŋ kaaja naɓo aan gɔɔ debm kɛn k'naak k'j'ɔɔɗin̰ don̰ maakŋ pooɗ ki.
46003016	'Jeelki, naase se ɓo 'ɓee gɛn Raa. Ɔɔ Nirl Raa se utu iŋg maakse ki.
46003017	Ɓee Raa ese se jaay debm tɔɔkin̰ga num, naan̰ kic Raa an̰ kutu. Taa ɓee Raa se naan̰ salal ɔɔ ɓee Raa ese se, taaɗ ute naase.
46003018	Bin se, nam ɔn̰te kaan̰ ron̰ dala. Maakse ki se jaay debm saap ɔɔ naan̰ debm jeel‑taara aan gɔɔ jee jeel‑taargen do duni ki ara num, bɛɛki se, n̰'tɛɗ ron̰ debm dɛrlɛ naan jeege tu ɔɔ bin jaay n̰'tɛɗn debm jeel‑taar mala mala.
46003019	Taa jee jeel‑taargen do duni ki ara se, Raa aakɗen naanin̰ ki se aan gɔɔ jee dɛrlge. Taa naan̰ se ɓo Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Jee ɔk jeel‑taar do duni ki sum se, Raa tɔkɗe do mɛtɛkɗe ki.
46003020	Tɛr Kitap taaɗ daala ɔɔ: Jee ɔk jeel‑taar do duni ki sum se, Mɛljege Raa jeel saapɗe ɔɔ saapm naaɗe se, naan̰ jeelin̰ saapm tɔɔl sɛr eyo.
46003021	Bin num nam ɔn̰te tɔɔm ron̰ ute nakŋ kɛn jikilimge lee tɛɗa. Taa nakge paac se 'gɛn naase:
46003022	maam Pɔli, Apɔlɔsi, Piɛri, duni ɓɔrse, nakŋ kɛn utu kaan do kiŋgjege tu ey lɛ do yojege tu ɔɔ nakgen 'kaan maakŋ kiŋgjege tun ɓɔrse ey lɛ kɛn 'tɛɗn naan ki se, nakgen se paac se 'gɛn naase.
46003023	Taa naase se 'tɛɗkiga gɛn al‑Masi ɔɔ al‑Masi se lɛ naan̰ gɛn Raa.
46004001	Tap ki num, aakjeki, naaje se lɛ, k'jee tɛɗn naabm al‑Masige ɔɔ nakŋ Raa kɛn ɔyin̰ga kɔyɔ kɛn jeege jeel mɛtin̰ ey se, Raa ɛɗjesin̰ga kaam jije taa j'an̰ taaɗin̰ jeege tu.
46004002	Anum debm j'ɛɗin̰ga naka kaam jin̰ se, n̰'ɔn̰te tujn̰ ɔrmin̰ do ki.
46004003	Maam se ɔlum eyo kɛn naase ɓo amki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dom ki, ey lɛ kɛn jee kɔjn̰ bɔɔrge ɓo am kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dom ki. Ɔɔ maam mala kic ɓo, m'kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dom ki eyo.
46004004	Ɗeere, maakum ki se, m'jeele maam se m'tuj te ɗim eyo. Naɓo kɛse am kɔŋ ɗaapm taarum eyo. Anum debm kɛn am kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dom ki se, Mɛljege.
46004005	Taa naan̰ se ɓo kɛn kaaɗin̰ j'ɔndin̰ jaay aan te ey se, ɔn̰te 'kɔjki bɔɔrɔ do nam ki, anum 'booyki Mɛljege aɗe ɓaa jaayo. Naan̰ ɓo nakŋ kɛn j'ɔyin̰ga kɔy maakŋ gɔt kɛn ɔɔɗ se, naan̰ utu an̰ kɔɔɗn 'tooɗn tal. Ɔɔ taar kɛn maakŋ jikilimge tu se, naan̰ utu an̰ kɔɔɗn 'tooɗn tal kici. Jaay ɓo, naŋa naŋa kic j'an̰ tɔɔmin̰ do naabin̰ kɛn naan̰ tɛɗa.
46004006	Taa naan̰ se ɓo gɛnaamge, kɛn ɔlum jaay m'taaɗ taa Apɔlɔs ute maam mala se, taa ute nakgen naaje k'tɛɗ se ɓo asen dooyo ɔɔ bin se naase aki kɔŋ deel do taar kɛn Kitap taaɗ se eyo. Bin se naŋa naŋa kic ɓo ɔn̰te magal ron̰ gɛn bɛɛr kuun deb kalaŋ ɔɔ deb kuuy se naan̰ an̰ kɔɔɗn kundu.
46004007	Anum naai tap ɓo 'tɛɗ roi jukuɗum se gɛn ɗi? Nakŋ naai ɔk se lɛ, Raa ɓo ɛɗi. Ɔɔ nakŋ kɛn jaay j'ɛɗisin̰ kɛɗ sum se, gɛn ɗi jaay naai 'magal roi aan gɔɔ Raa ɓo ɛɗisin̰ ey se?
46004008	Naase 'saapki ɔɔki nakŋ maakse je paac ɓo, ɔŋin̰kiga ɔɔ naase ɓo 'tɛɗkiga jee nak dɛnge ɔɔ naase ɓo 'tɛɗkiga gaarin̰ge ɔɔ naaje lɛ, k'gaarin̰ge eyo! Maam m'je se kɛn naase ɓo gaarin̰ge ɗeer num, ɔɔ ute naan̰ se naaje kic j'kɔsn gaara ɓɔrse ute naase.
46004009	Maam m'saapm m'ɔɔ naajen jee kaan̰ naabm Isage se, Raa tɛɗjen k'tɛɗga mɛtn jeege tu aan gɔɔ jee kɛn k'tɔkɗe gɛn ɓaa tɔɔlɔ. Aan gɔɔ naaɗe se Raa ɔn̰je naaje kic do duni ki se j'aakjen mɛtje naan kɔɗn Raage tu ɔɔ naan jikilimge tu.
46004010	Taa al‑Masi se, naaje j'aakje aan gɔɔ jee dɛrlge, num gaŋ naasen kɛn 'dɔɔkkiga ute al‑Masi se lɛ, jeege aaksen naase se 'tɛɗkiga jee jeel‑taarge! Naaje se j'aakjen aan gɔɔ jee ɔk tɔɔg eyo ɔɔ naase lɛ, jeege aakse naase se jee ɔk tɔɔgɔ! Naase se jeege aalsen maak ki, naɓo naaje se lɛ, nam tap ɓo aaljen maak ki eyo!
46004011	Bini ɓɔrse kic ɓoa ute maane utu tɔɔljen tɔɔl rɔk. Kal tuusje kic ɓo utu daayjen daaye ɔɔ jeege utu 'lee dabarjen dabara ɔɔ naaje j'utu k'lee lee wari rɔk.
46004012	Naaje k'dabar k'tɛɗn naaba ute jije jaay ɓo k'j'ɔsɔ. Jeege naajje ɔɔ naaje k'j'ɔɔɗɗen ɓooro. K'dabarje kic ɓo naaje k'j'aay kaamje k'j'aasin̰a.
46004013	Naaje se, jeege lee taaɗjen taar iŋg kus roje ki ɔɔ naaje k'taaɗ jeege tun se ute taar nijim kɛn ɛɗɗen kaay kaama. Bini ɓɔrse kic ɓo jikilimgen duni ki se, aakjen naaje se aan gɔɔ iɗikŋ roa ɔɔ aan gɔɔ nakŋ do danos ki.
46004014	Kɛn ɔlum jaay maam m'raaŋsen taargen se, taa m'asen kɔl maakŋ sɔkɔn̰ ki eyo, num aan gɔɔ naase gaan maakjemge se, m'je ɓo m'asen kaal bisi ki.
46004015	Anum kɛn ɗoobm al‑Masi ki jaay ɔkki jee dooyge dupu‑sik kic num, bubse se kalaŋ sum. Ɔɔ maam kɛn m'taaɗsen Labar Jigan gɛn al‑Masi se, ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki se, maam sum ɓo m'tɛɗga bubse.
46004016	Bin ɓo maam m'dɛjsen m'ɔɔ: uunki bɔlɔtn maama.
46004017	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, maam m'ɔlsen Timote kɛn goon kɔɔn̰ maakuma ɔɔ debm tuj ɔrmin̰ eyo ɗoobm Mɛljege tu. Kɛn naan̰ jaay ɓaa ɔŋsega se, naan̰ asen taaɗn ɗoobm kɛn maam m'leen ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki se. Ɔɔ gɔtɔ ɓaa se paac, maam m'dooy jeegen eglizge tu paac ute ɗoobm se.
46004018	Jee mɛtin̰ge maakse ki se, magal roɗe. Naaɗe saap ɔɔ maam m'kɔŋ tɛrl ɓaa gɔtse ki eyo.
46004019	Kɛn Mɛljege je num, sɔm m'utu m'ɓaa gɔtse ki, ɔɔ kɛn maam m'aanga num, m'ɓaa booy mɛtn taar jee kɛn magal roɗe se sum eyo, num m'kaakŋ nakŋ kɛn naaɗe lee tɛɗa.
46004020	Kɛn jeegen jaay Raa ɔs gaar doɗe ki se, naaɗe taaɗin̰ ute taarɗe sum eyo, num maakŋ kiŋgɗe ki se, naaɗe taaɗ tɔɔgŋ Raa.
46004021	Naase tap ɓo 'jeki ɗi? M'asen ɓaa kɔŋ ute taar urlu ɔɔ ute maak‑je lɔɓu 'jeki m'asen ɓaa kɔŋ ute sirɗi lɛ?
46005001	Gɔtɔ ɓaa se paac, jeege taaɗ ɔɔ naase se, 'lee ɛɛski naapge rɛn̰ rɛn̰. Nakŋ kɛn debse tɛɗin̰ se, jee jeel Raa mal ey kic ɓo ɔŋ tɛɗ naan̰ se eyo: naan̰ se tooɗ te mɛnd bubin̰a.
46005002	Ute naan̰ se kic ɓo naase 'tɔɔmki tɔɔm rose. Ey num naase se, maakse 'tuju ɔɔ debm jaay tɛɗ nakŋ bin se, bɛɛki num, 'tuurin̰ki naatn maakse ki.
46005003	Ɗeere, maam se m'dɔkɔ naɓo saapum se te naase. Anum debm tɛɗ nakŋ bin se, maam m'ɔjin̰ga bɔɔrɔ don̰ ki aan gɔɔ maam m'utu maakse ki.
46005004	Kɛn naase 'tuskiga ute ro Mɛljege Isa se, saapum se ute te naase ɔɔ gɔtn se Mɛljege Isa taaɗn tɔɔgin̰a.
46005005	Naase se, debm tɛɗ nakŋ bin se, j'ɔn̰in̰ kaam ji Ɓubm sitange an̰ dabara taa maakje daa ro kɛn naan̰ ɔk se 'tɛɗn gɔtɔ ɔɔ bin ɓo ɓii kɛn Mɛljege aɗe ɓaa se, kon̰ se 'kɔŋ kaaja.
46005006	Nakŋ naase 'tɛɗki jaay 'tɔɔmki rose ro ki se, ɗoobin̰ eyo. Naase 'jeelki ey la, ɔrɔmɔ cɔkɔ jaay j'ɔmbin̰ga do rujn̰ gɛm kɛn j'ɛcin̰ga kɛc se, iin̰in̰ paac.
46005007	Ɔrɔm kɛn do dɔkin̰ kɛn taaɗ te kusin̰ se, ɔɔɗki dose ro ki. Bin ɓo aki tɛɗn aan gɔɔ rujn̰ gɛm kɛn j'utu j'ɛcin̰ kɛc jaay j'ɔmbin̰ te ɔrɔm ey se. Taa al‑Masi se, naan̰ ɓo ɛɗ ron̰ sɛrkɛ taa naajege aan gɔɔ goon baatn kɛn Yaudge lee tɔɔl ɓii laa Paakɗe ki se.
46005008	J'ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki laajege ute mappan kɛn ɔk ɔrɔm do dɔkin̰ se. Ɔrɔm ese se, je taaɗ ute nakgen jig eyo ɔɔ ute nakgen kusin̰a. Anum k'tɛɗki laajege se ute mappan kɛn ɔk ɔrɔm eyo, kɛse je ɗeekŋ ɔɔ ute maakŋ kalaŋ ɔɔ ute kɛn mɛt ki.
46005009	Maakŋ maktub kɛn maam m'raaŋsen kaam mɔɔtn se, maam m'ɗeeksenga m'ɔɔ: jee kɛn lee ɛɛs naapa rɛn̰ rɛn̰ se, ɔn̰te tɔkɗeki mɛɗɛ.
46005010	Kɛse maam m'je taaɗ ute jee do duni kɛn lee ɛɛs naapge rɛn̰ rɛn̰, ey lɛ jee lee dɔŋ nakŋ jeege, ey lɛ jee boogge, ey lɛ jee maragge paac se eyo. Kɛn bin num, jee do duni ki se, naase aɗeki teecn̰ kɔn̰ɔ.
46005011	Gɔtɔ, bin eyo! Maam m'raaŋsen se taa debm taaɗ ɔɔ naan̰ gɛnaa ɗoobm Isa ki, jaay ɓo ɛɛsn mɛndge rɛn̰ rɛn̰i, ɓoogo, tɛɗ maraga, ɔɔɗ jeege, aay tɔtɔ deel te gɔtin̰a, ɔɔ kucun jeege se. Debm bin se, ɔn̰te 'kɔkin̰ki mɛɗɛ ɔɔ kɔsɔ kic ɓo, ɔn̰te 'kɔski ute naan̰a.
46005012	Anum jee kɛn ɗoobm al‑Masi ki ey se, maam ɓo m'aɗe kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ doɗe ki eyo, num naaɗe se Raa ɓo kɛn utu aɗen kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ doɗe ki. Num naase se, ɔjki bɔɔrɔ do gɛnaasege tun ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki, taa Kitap taaɗga taaɗ ɔɔ: Debm kusin̰ se, 'tuurin̰ki naatn maakse ki.
46006001	Kɛn maakse ki jaay deb kalaŋ ɔk taara ute gɛnaan̰ num, naase, ɔn̰ki jee Raage ɔɔ 'sakakin̰ki gɔtn jeege tun jeel Raa mal ey se gɛn ɗi?
46006002	'Jeelki jee Raage ɓo utu kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do jeege tun do duni ki se. Num kɛn jee duni ki jaay naase ɓo utu aɗeki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ num, taargen sɛɛm sɛɛm daanse ki se, naase ɔŋ aaski gɛn tɔɔlin̰ ey ne?
46006003	Naajege ɓo j'utu j'aki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do kɔɗn Raage tu se, naase tap ɓo 'jeelki ey la? Kɛn bin num, mɛt kando naajege j'an̰ki kaasn gɛn taaɗn tɔɔl taargen do duni ki se!
46006004	Naɓo kɛn naase jaay ɔkki taara daanse ki se, naase 'ɓaaki gɔtn jee kɔjn̰ bɔɔrge tun egliz aalɗen maak ki eyo.
46006005	Maam m'taaɗsen taa sɔkɔn̰ asen tɔɔlɔ. Maakse ki se, gɛnaa kɛn jeel‑taar kɛn asen kaakŋ mɛtn taarse se tap ɓo, gɔtn ne?
46006006	Num gaŋ j'aak gɛnaa kɛn ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki kɛn ɔk taara ute gɛnaan̰ kɛn ɗoobm al‑Masi kic se ɔɔ ɓaa sakakin̰ naan jeege tun ɗoobm al‑Masi ki eyo.
46006007	Anum kɛn ɔkki taara ute naapa jaay 'sakakki naapa se, kɛse naase oockiga ɗoobm Raa ki. Kɛn deba jaay tujsega se naase ɔŋ aasin̰ki ey ne? Kɛn deba jaay 'ɓoogga ne ɗimse se naase ɔŋ aasin̰ki ey ne? Kɛn naase ɔŋ aasin̰kiga se, bɛɛ cir kɛn naase aɗeki ɓaa sakak se.
46006008	Num gaŋ naase ɓo 'lee 'tujki jeege tu ɔɔ 'lee ɓoogki nakŋ jeege. Ɔɔ jee kɛn naase 'lee 'tɛɗɗeki nakŋ se doɗe ki se, naaɗe se ɓo gɛnaasegen ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki.
46006009	Naase 'jeelki, jeegen kɛn tɛɗn nakge ute ɗoobin̰ ey se, 'kɔŋ kɛnd maakŋ Gaar Raa ki eyo. Ɔn̰te 'kaan̰ki rose dala: jee lee ɛɛs naapa rɛn̰ rɛn̰, jee maragge, gaabgen lee ɛɛs mɛnd jeege ute mɛndgen lee ɛɛs gaabm jeege, gaabgen paacn̰ kɛn lee ɛɛs naapa,
46006010	jee ɓoogge, jee tamage, jee aay tɔtɔ deel te gɔtin̰a, jee kɔɔɗn jeege, jee tujn̰ nakŋ jeege, naaɗe se paac 'kɔŋ kɛnd maakŋ Gaar Raa ki eyo.
46006011	Bin ɓo do dɔkin̰ maakse ki se, jee mɛtin̰ge tɛɗo nakgen se, num gaŋ ute ro Mɛljege Isa al‑Masi ɔɔ ute Nirlin̰ se, Raa tug ɗaapsega, tɛɗsenga 'tɛɗkiga jee naan̰ge ɔɔ aakkiga bɛɛ naanin̰ ki.
46006012	Nam taaɗ ɔɔ: Maam se, m'ɔk ɗoobo gɛn tɛɗn nakge paac. Ɗeere, maam se m'ɔk ɗoobo gɛn tɛɗn nakge paac naɓo, nakge paac maakin̰ se, ɔŋ tɔɔlum sɛr eyo. Ɗeere, maam se m'ɔk ɗoobo gɛn tɛɗn nakge paac, naɓo maam se m'kɔŋ kɔn̰ rom gɛn tɛɗn ɓul ne ɗim eyo.
46006013	Tɛr nam taaɗ ɔɔ: Nakŋ‑kɔsɔ se, k'tɛɗin̰ taa maaka, ɔɔ maaka se lɛ gɛn nakŋ‑kɔsɔ. Ɗeere, num nakŋ‑kɔsɔ ute maaka se Raa utu aɗen tɛɗn 'tɛɗn gɔtɔ. Num gaŋ ro se, Raa tɛɗin̰ gɛn kɛɛsn naapm rɛn̰ rɛn̰ eyo, taa rojege se naan̰ gɛn Mɛljege, ɔɔ Mɛljege se lɛ naan̰ ɓo Mɛl rojege.
46006014	Ɔɔ Raa kɛn duro Mɛljege daan yoge tu se, ute tɔɔgin̰ se, naan̰ utu ajeki 'dur naajege kici.
46006015	Naase 'jeelki naŋa naŋa kic ɓo maakŋ ro al‑Masi ki se, naan̰ tɛɗga ron̰ kaam kalaŋ. Bin se, maam se m'kɔŋ kuun ro al‑Masi kaam kalaŋ jaay m'an̰ tum ute ro mɛnd kɛɛsn gaaba la? Kɛse gɔtɔ.
46006016	'Jeelki, deba jaay tooɗ ute mɛnd kɛɛsn gaaba se, naaɗe tum tɛɗga ro kalaŋ. Taa Kitap taaɗga taaɗ ɔɔ: Naaɗen di se tum tɛɗ daa ro kalaŋ.
46006017	Num gaŋ debm dɔɔk ute Mɛljege se, naan̰ tum tɛɗga kalaŋ ute naan̰a.
46006018	'Booyki, kɛɛsn naapm rɛn̰ rɛn̰ se, ɔɔɗki dose naatn dɔkɔ ro ki! Kusin̰ paacn̰ kɛn debkilimi lee tɛɗ se, ɔŋ tuj ron̰ aan gɔɔ kɛɛsn mɛndgen rɛn̰ rɛn̰ se eyo, num gaŋ debm jaay ɛɛs mɛndge rɛn̰ rɛn̰ se, naan̰ ɔl ron̰ paac maakŋ kusin̰ ki.
46006019	Naase 'jeelki rosege se tɛɗga ɓee gɛn Nirl Salal kɛn Raa ɛɗsesin̰o ɔɔ ɓɔrse, naan̰ utu maakse ki. Bin num rosege se, tɛɗga gɛn naase 'malin̰ge eyo.
46006020	Taa Raa se, dugsega dose ute zo ɔɔn̰ɔ. Kɛn bin num, ɔn̰ki rose se 'nookŋ Raa.
46007001	Ɓɔrse maam m'je m'asen tɛrlɛ do taar kɛn naase 'raaŋumkiro maakŋ maktubse ki se. Kɛn 'tɛɗn jiga num gaaba ɔn̰te kɔkŋ mɛnda.
46007002	Naɓo, taa aki lee kɛɛsn naapge rɛn̰ rɛn̰ ey se, gaabm gay gay kic ɓo, n̰'ɔk mɛnda ɔɔ mɛnd gay gay kic lɛ n̰'ɔk gaaba.
46007003	Gaaba jaay je mɛndin̰ se, mɛnda ɔn̰te gaasin̰ ron̰a. Ɔɔ kɛn mɛnda ɓo je gaabin̰ kic lɛ, gaabin̰ ɔn̰te gaasin̰ ron̰a.
46007004	Taa gaaba se, ɔk tɔɔgɔ do ron̰ ki eyo, ron̰ se tɛɗga gɛn mɛndin̰a ɔɔ mɛnda kic lɛ, ɔk tɔɔgɔ do ron̰ ki eyo, ron̰ se tɛɗga gɛn gaabin̰a.
46007005	Kɛn naase jaay 'jeki 'gaasn rose taa aki tɔnd mɛtn Raa se, do naan̰ ki se 'taaɗ tɔɔlin̰ki ute naapa; ɔɔ kaaɗ kɛn naase 'gaaski rose naapge tu se, ɔn̰te 'kiŋgki do ki daanin̰ tɛɗn dɔkɔ, num 'tɛrl iŋgki aan gɔɔ kɛn do dɔkin̰ naase 'tiŋgkiro se. Ey num kɛn ɔŋ aasin̰ki te do rose ki ey se, sɔm Ɓubm sitange 'kɔŋ ɗoobo asen naama.
46007006	Kɛn ɔlum jaay m'taaɗ bin se, kɛse maam m'undsen kund ɓo kul eyo, num maam m'taaɗsen taaɗ ɓo ɗoobo sum.
46007007	Maam m'je se, jeege paac 'kiŋg aan gɔɔ maama kɛn m'ɔk te mɛnd ey se. Naɓo naŋa naŋa kic ɓo Raa ɛɗin̰ naabin̰ gɛn don̰ don̰a. Deb kalaŋ Raa ɔɔɗin̰ ɗoobo gɛn kɔkŋ mɛnda ɔɔ deb kuuy se lɛ, Raa tɛɗin̰ gɛn 'tiŋg arbiya.
46007008	Arbige ute mɛnd‑daayge se, m'taaɗɗen m'ɔɔ: kɛn aɗen 'tɛɗn jiga se num k'j'iŋg aan gɔɔ maam kɛn m'ɔk mɛnd ey se.
46007009	Anum kɛn naaɗe jaay an̰ kaasn do roɗege tu ey se, mɛndge lɛ k'tɔkŋ gaabge ɔɔ gaabge kic lɛ k'tɔkŋ mɛndge. Taa debm jaay ɔk kɔk se, bɛɛ cir debm kɛn ɔk te eyo ɔɔ aakga mɛndge num lee dɔŋɗe ute maakin̰ se.
46007010	Ɓɔrse m'je taaɗn ute jeegen tɔkga tɔk naapa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki. Taar se maam ɓo m'taaɗin̰ eyo num Mɛljege ɓo taaɗin̰a: mɛnd jaay ɔkga gaaba se, ɔn̰te rɛsn ute gaabin̰a.
46007011	Kɛn naan̰ rɛsŋga ute gaabin̰ lɛ, n̰'ɔn̰te kɔkŋ gaabm kuuy. Ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ ɓo jega gaaba lɛ, n̰'tɛrlo ro gaabin̰ ki. Anum gaaba kic n̰'ɔn̰te piir ute mɛndin̰a.
46007012	Jeege tun kuuy se, kɛse maam ɓo m'taaɗɗen ey num Mɛljege eyo, m'ɔɔ: gɛnaa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki jaay mɛnd naan̰ iŋg ɓee se jaay aal te maakin̰ do al‑Masi ki ey se, ɔɔ mɛnd se jaay took je kiŋg ute naan̰ num, n̰'ɔn̰te piirin̰a.
46007013	Ɔɔ mɛnd ɗoobm al‑Masi ki jaay, gaabm naan̰ iŋg ɓee ute naan̰ se jaay aal te maakin̰ do al‑Masi ki ey se, kɛn gaabm se jaay took je kiŋg ute naan̰ num, mɛnd se n̰'ɔn̰te 'rɛsin̰a.
46007014	Taa gaabm jaay aal te maakin̰ do Isa ki eyo ɔɔ ɔk mɛnd kɛn aalga kaal maakin̰ do Isa ki se, taa mɛnd naan̰ ɔk se tɛɗin̰ naan̰ tɛɗga gɔɔr ute Raa. Mɛnd kɛn aal te maakin̰ do Isa al‑Masi ki ey jaay, ɔk gaabm kɛn aalga kaal maakin̰ do Isa ki se, taa gaabm naan̰ ɔk se tɛɗin̰ naan̰ tɛɗga gɔɔr ute Raa kici. Kɛn bin ey num, gɛnɗege se 'tɛɗn dɔk te Raa, num gaŋ ɗeer ɗeer, naaɗe se gɔɔr ute Raa.
46007015	Kɛn deba aal te maakin̰ do Isa al‑Masi ki ey jaay je an piir ute mɛndin̰ kɛn aalga kaal maakin̰ do al‑Masi ki se, ɔn̰ɗeki kɛn naaɗe jaay je piiri num, k'piiri. Kɛn 'tɛɗn gaaba ey lɛ mɛnda ɗim jaay aɗen tum ute debm kɛn aal te maakin̰ do Isa ki ey se, gɔtɔ. Taa Raa daŋseno se, taa aki kiŋg ute lapia.
46007016	Anum naai mɛnd ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki se, 'jeelin̰ gaabi se an̰ kɔŋ kaasn gɛn tɔɔɗn kɔl gɔtn kaaj ki la? Ɔɔ naai gaabm ɗoobm Isa al‑Masi ki se kic, 'jeelin̰ mɛndi se an̰ kɔŋ kaasn gɛn tɔɔɗn kɔl gɔtn kaaj ki la?
46007017	Taar kɛn kuuy kɛn m'je m'asen taaɗ se, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo, iŋg gɔt kɛn Mɛljege ɔndin̰ ro ki ɔɔ gɔtn kiŋgin̰ kɛn ese ɓo Raa daŋin̰o. Anum taargen se ɓo kɛn maam m'lee m'dooy eglizge paac.
46007018	Kɛn Raa daŋi ɓo naai ɔjga kɔj pɔndɔ lɛ, ɔn̰te kɔyin̰a, num iŋg ute kɔjn̰ pɔndi se. Ɔɔ kɛn Raa daŋi jaay naai utu ɔj te pɔndɔ ey lɛ, ɔn̰te kɔjn̰ pɔndɔ.
46007019	Debm ɔjga pɔndɔ ɔɔ debm kɛn ɔj te eyo, paac ɓo tɛɗ ɗim eyo. Num nakŋ jiga cir paac se, debm tɛɗn nakgen kɛn Raa ɔɔ k'tɛɗin̰ se.
46007020	Anum naŋa naŋa kic ɓo, ɔn̰ 'kiŋg gɔtn kiŋgin̰ kɛn Raa daŋin̰o ro ki se.
46007021	Kɛn Raa daŋio se, naai 'ɓul lɛ? Ɔn̰te kuun nirli, num gaŋ kɛn naai jaay ɔk ɗoobo gɛn kɔɔɗn doi maakŋ ɓul ki se lɛ, kɛse ɓo nakŋ jiga.
46007022	Ɓul jaay Mɛljege Raa daŋin̰oga se, naan̰ ɔŋga don̰ gɔtn Mɛljege tu; bin ɓo debm ɓul ey jaay Mɛljege Raa daŋin̰ga se, naan̰ tɛɗga ɓul gɛn al‑Masi.
46007023	Naase se Raa dugsega dose ute zo ɔɔn̰ɔ; bin num naase se ɔn̰te 'tɛɗki ɓulu gɛn jikilimge.
46007024	Gɛnaamge, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo iŋg gɔtn kiŋgin̰ kɛn do dɔkin̰ gɔtn kɛn Raa daŋin̰o ro ki se.
46007025	Ɓɔrse maam m'je m'asen tɛrlɛ do mɛtn taar jeege tun kɛn tɔk te gaabge ute mɛndge eyo. Ɔɔ taar se Mɛljege ɓo undum te kul eyo, num maam ɓo m'saapa ɔɔ m'je m'asesin̰ taaɗa; ɔɔ naase 'jeelumki maam se Mɛljege tɛɗumga bɛɛ ɔɔ taar kɛn maam m'taaɗ se naase 'tookki do ki taa maam se m'tuj ɔrmum eyo.
46007026	Ute dubar kɛn j'aakin̰ki ɓɔrse se, m'saap m'ɔɔ: kɛn 'tɛɗn jiga se gaaba ey lɛ mɛnda se n̰'kiŋg bini.
46007027	Kɛn ɔk mɛnda lɛ, ɔn̰te piirin̰a. Ɔɔ kɛn ɔk te ey lɛ, ɔn̰te kɔkɔ.
46007028	Num gaŋ kɛn ɔkga mɛnda kic num, naai 'tɛɗ te kusin̰ eyo. Ɔɔ kɛn goon mɛnda ɓo ɔkga gaaba kic num, tɛɗ te kusin̰ ey kici. 'Jeelki jee iŋg kiŋg ɓee se kiŋgɗe utu aɗen tɛɗn ɔɔn̰ɔ. Taa naan̰ se ɓo maam m'je nakgen se 'kaan dose ki eyo.
46007029	'Booyki m'asen taaɗa gɛnaamge: ɓɛrɛ, kaaɗn kɛn Raa gaaŋin̰ se ɔɔpga baata. Bin num naan ki se, gaabgen kɛn ɔk mɛndge se, k'tɛɗn naaba Raa ki aan gɔɔ jee kɛn tɔk te mɛndge eyo;
46007030	jee kɛn eem keem se, k'tɛɗn naaba Raa ki aan gɔɔ jee kɛn eem keem eyo, ɔɔ jee kɛn maakɗe raap se lɛ, k'tɛɗn naaba Raa ki aan gɔɔ jee kɛn maakɗe raap eyo, jee kɛn lee dugŋ nakge se lɛ, k'tɛɗn naaba Raa ki aan gɔɔ jee ɔk ɗim eyo,
46007031	ɔɔ jee kɛn tɛɗn naaba ute nakgen naaɗe ɔk do duni ki se lɛ, j'ɔn̰te kɔnd saapɗe do nakge tun se, taa duni ara se utu 'deele.
46007032	Maam m'je naase aki kuun nirlse eyo. Taa naan̰ se ɓo debm jaay ɔk te mɛnd ey se, naan̰ saapm do naabm Mɛljege tu ɔɔ naan̰ je ɗoobm nakŋ kɛn 'tɔɔl Mɛljege tu.
46007033	Num gaŋ debm jaay ɔk mɛnda se, naan̰ uun nirlin̰ taa nakgen do duni ki ɔɔ naan̰ se saap ɓo je ɗoobm nakŋ kɛn 'tɔɔl mɛndin̰ ki.
46007034	Debm bin se, saapin̰ tɛɗn kaam dio. Anum mɛnd ɔk te gaab ey se, ey lɛ goon mɛnda se, naaɗe se saap do naabm Mɛljege tu ɔɔ maakɗe ute roɗe paac, naaɗe ɔn̰in̰ Mɛljege tu. Num gaŋ mɛnd ute gaabin̰ se, naan̰ uun nirlin̰ taa nakgen do duni ki ɔɔ naan̰ se je ɗoobm nakŋ kɛn 'tɔɔl gaabin̰ ki.
46007035	Maam m'taaɗsen bin se, taa asen tɛɗn bɛɛ, ey num maam se m'je m'asen gaasn ɗoob eyo. Nakŋ maam m'je naase aki tɛɗ se, nakŋ kɛn bɛɛ cir daala ɔɔ aki tɛɗn naabm Mɛljege se ute maakŋ kalaŋ.
46007036	Kɛn goon kɔɗɔ saap ɔɔ mɛnd kɛɛsin̰ se jaay naan̰ ɔkin̰ te ey num, an̰ tuj maakin̰ se ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jaay je mɛnd kɛɛsin̰ se deel te gɔtin̰, aakin̰ bɛɛki num, an̰ kɔk se, ɔn̰ ɔkin̰a. Kɛn naan̰ ɔkin̰ga kic ɓo, tɛɗ te kusin̰ eyo.
46007037	Num gaŋ kɛn goon kɔɗɔ ɔk mɛnd kɛɛsɛ, ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jaay aasin̰ do ron̰ ki, ɔɔ naan̰ mala ɓo uun doa, nam ɓo gaasin̰ gɛn kɔkin̰ ey se, ɔɔ saap ɔɔ an̰ kɔŋ kɔk ey se, ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jaay ɔŋ aasin̰ do ron̰ ki ɔŋ ɓaa te ron̰ ki ey se, naan̰ tɛɗga jiga naan Raa ki.
46007038	Bin ɓo debm ɔk mɛnd kɛɛsɛ jaay ɔkin̰ga num jiga, num debm jaay ɔkin̰ te ey se, tɛr tɛɗga jiga cir daala.
46007039	Kɛn mɛnda jaay gaabin̰ utu ooy te ey se, naan̰ ɔk ɗoobm an̰ rɛs eyo. Anum kɛn gaabin̰ ooyga jaay ɓo, naan̰ ɔk ɗoobo gɛn kɔkŋ gaabm kuuy kɛn naan̰ maakin̰ jea. Naɓo gaabin̰ se 'tɛɗn debm ɗoobm al‑Masi ki jaayo.
46007040	Jiga se n̰'ɔn̰te kɔkŋ gaabm kuuy. Bin se naan̰ 'kiŋg ute maak‑raapo cir daala. Kɛse ɓo saapm maama ɔɔ maam m'jeele maam kic m'ɔk Nirl Raa maakum ki.
46008001	Ɓɔrse, maam m'je m'asen tɛrl do mɛtn taar daa maragge tu. Aan gɔɔ naase ɔɔki: Ɗeere, naajege paacki se k'j'ɔkki jeele. Naɓo jeel nakŋ kɛn debkilimi ɔk se, oopin̰ don̰a. Num gaŋ maak‑je do naapge tu se, noogjeki gɛn ziiɗn ɓaa ute naanjege.
46008002	Kɛn nam jaay saap ɔɔ naan̰ ɔk jeele se, kɛse naan̰ utu jeel te ɗim ey ɓɔrtɔ.
46008003	Num gaŋ debm jaay je Raa se, Raa jeelin̰a.
46008004	Naase ɔɔki: daa maragge se, naajege j'ɔkki ɗoobo gɛn kɔsɔ lɔɓu gɛn kɔs ey lɛ? K'jeelki, maraggen do duni ki se, nakŋ rɛn̰ cɛrɛ ɔɔ Raa lɛ naan̰ kalaŋ lak, Raa kuuy se, gɔtɔ.
46008005	Ɗeere, jee mɛtin̰ge taaɗ ɔɔ raagen kuuy utu maakŋ raa ki ɔɔ do naaŋ ki kici. Jee bin se ɔk raage ute mɛlge dɛna kɛn naaɗe lee ɛrg naanɗege tu ɔɔ eemɗe.
46008006	Num gaŋ naajege se, k'jeelki Raa se, naan̰ kalaŋ lak. Naan̰ ɓo Bubjege ɔɔ nakge paac iin̰o gɔtn naan̰ ki ɔɔ kɛn naajege j'utu j'iŋgki se kic ɓo, ute naan̰a. Ɔɔ Mɛljege kic ɓo kalaŋ sum, naan̰ ɓo Isa al‑Masi ɔɔ ute naan̰ se ɓo, nakge paac utu tiŋg gɔtɗe ki ɔɔ naajege kic ɓo kiŋgjege kaam ji naan̰a.
46008007	Num gaŋ taar mɛt kɛn ese se, jeege paac jeel ɔk te mɛtin̰ eyo. Jee mɛtin̰ge se, deelga deel ute maragge ɔɔ ɓɔrse kic ɓo kɛn naaɗe ɔs kɔs daa maragge num, aakin̰ aan gɔɔ daa se gɛn maragge. Anum ute saapɗen kɛn ɔŋ jeel ɔk mɛtn nakge mɛc ey se, naaɗe saap ɔɔ kɛse tujɗenga naan Raa ki.
46008008	K'jeelki, nakŋ kɔsɔ se, ajeki kɔŋ naakŋ naan Raa ki eyo. Kɛn j'ɔskiga lɛ, ajeki ziiɗn ɗim eyo ɔɔ kɛn j'ɔski te ey kic lɛ, ɗimjegen 'kut tap ɓo gɔtɔ.
46008009	Naase se ɔkki ɗoobo kɛn kɔsn nakge paac, naɓo ɔndki kɔndɔ, ɔn̰te 'kɔlki jeegen ɔk tɔɔgɔ naan Raa ki ey se, 'koocn̰ ɗoobm Raa ki.
46008010	Aan gɔɔ naai kɛn 'jeel nakŋ mɛt ki jaay, iŋg ɓee marag ki ɔɔ iŋg ɔs kɔs daa maraga se, gɛnaai kɛn saapin̰ ɔŋ jeel ɔk te mɛtn nakŋ mɛc ey se jaay aakki naai iŋg ɔs kɔs se, naai an̰ kɔlin̰ naan̰ kic ɓo 'kɔsn daa maraga se.
46008011	Bin ɓo ute jeeli kɛn naai ɔk se, gɛnaa kɛn saapin̰ jeel ɔk te mɛtn nakŋ mɛc ey se, naai an̰ kɔlin̰ naan̰ 'kutu, ey num gɛnaa ese ɓo kɛn al‑Masi ooy taarin̰ se.
46008012	Kɛn naai 'tɛɗ bin se, kɛse naai 'tɛɗ kusin̰ gɛnaaige tun saapɗe ɔŋ jeel ɔk te mɛtn nakge mɛc ey se ɔɔ 'tujɗe maakɗe. Bin se naai 'tɛɗ kusin̰ ɓo al‑Masi ki.
46008013	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, kɛn taa kɔsɔ sum ɓo 'kɔl gɛnaam koocn̰ ɗoobm Raa ki se, mɔɔtn maam m'kɔsn daa eyo taa gɛnaam se 'koocn̰ ɗoobm Raa ki eyo.
46009001	Anum, maam se nakŋ ɔk tɔɔgɔ dom ki utu la? Maam se, m'debm kaan̰ naabm Isa ey la? Ɔɔ Mɛljege Isa se, maam m'aakin̰oga ute kaamum ey la? Naase se, maam ɓo m'ɓaanseno ɗoobm Mɛljege tu ey la?
46009002	Kɛn jee kuuy jaay ɔɔ maam se m'debm kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masi ey kic ɓo, naase se 'jeelki maam m'debm kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masi. Aan gɔɔ naase 'dɔɔkkiga ute Mɛljege se ute naase se ɓo, jeege jeele maam se m'debm kaan̰ naabm Isa.
46009003	Jee kɛn ɔkum mindum se, kɛse ɓo taar kɛn maam m'ɔko kɛn m'je m'aɗen tɛrlɛ:
46009004	taa naabm kɛn naaje k'tɛɗ se, naaje j'ɔk ɗoobo kɛn naase ajeki kɛɗn kɔsɔ ute kaaye ey ne?
46009005	Naaje se j'ɔk ɗoobo gɛn tɔkŋ mɛndgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki ɔɔ gɛn lee ute mɛndjege aan gɔɔ jee kaan̰ naabm Isa al‑Masigen kuuy ute gɛnaa Mɛljege Isa ɔɔ aan gɔɔ Piɛr se ey la?
46009006	Lɔɓu maam m'ute Barnabas kaljeki sum ɓo, k'tɛɗn naaba ute jije jaay j'an kɔsn ne?
46009007	Naase 'booykiga la kɛn deba uunga asgar jaay, naan̰ malin̰ ɓo ɓaa jeɗo gurs taa an kɔgŋ ro naan̰ malin̰ se, utu ne? Ɓii kalaŋ jaay deba naab maakŋ gɔtin̰ jaay 'kɔŋ kɔsn nakŋ maakŋ gɔtin̰ ki ey se, utu ne? Lɔ debm gaama jaay aay si maalin̰ge ey se, utu ne?
46009008	Anum nakŋ kɛn maam m'taaɗsen se, jikilimge ɓo lee tɛɗin̰ sum eyo, num Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki kic ɓo taaɗin̰ga taaɗa.
46009009	Taa Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki se k'raaŋ j'ɔɔ: Maraŋ tiiko nakŋ tɔnd gɛmɛ se, j'ɔn̰te kɔlin̰ ɗim taarin̰ ki kɛn an̰ gaasn kɔsɔ. Bin num gɔtn ese se Raa taaɗ ute maraŋge la?
46009010	Naan̰ taaɗ ute naajge ey ne? Ɗeer ɗeer, taar se k'raaŋin̰ taa naajege. Taa naan̰ se ɓo debm naabm maakŋ gɔtin̰a ɔɔ debm tɔnd gɛmin̰ se naŋa naŋa kic ɓo ɔnd don̰ do nak kɛn naan̰ utu 'kɔŋ se.
46009011	Naaje jaay k'ɓaa k'taaɗsen taar Raa aan gɔɔ debm kɛn ɔɔc maakŋ gɔtin̰a ɔɔ kɛn k'tɔndga mɛtse j'ɔɔ k'je ɗim gɔtse ki se kɛn bin num k'tɔndga mɛtse k'deelga utu gɔtin̰ dɛn dɛn la?
46009012	Kɛn jee kuuy jaay ɔk ɗoobo gɛn kuun ɗim gɔtse ki num, naaje se mɛt kando j'ɔk ɗoobo k'cirɗen naaɗe se daal ey la? Ute naan̰ se kic ɓo naaje se j'uun te ɗim gɔtse ki eyo. Anum dubargen jaay an doje ki paac se, naaje j'aasin̰a, taa Labar Jigan gɛn al‑Masi se naaje k'je k'tɛɗn nakŋ jaay 'gaasn jeege gɛn booy 'kuun taar se eyo.
46009013	'Jeelki, jee kɛn tɛɗn naaba maakŋ Ɓee Raa ki se, kɔsɗe se naaɗe ɔŋ maakŋ nakge tun jeege ɓaano sɛrkɛ maakŋ Ɓee Raa ki se. Ɔɔ jee kɛn tɛɗn naaba gɔt kɛn k'lee k'tɔjn̰ mooso Raa ki se lɛ, naaɗe se kic ɔŋ bɛɗɗe gɔtn ese.
46009014	Bin ɓo Mɛljege taaɗ ɔɔ: jee kɛn lee taaɗ Labar Jiga gɛn al‑Masi jeege tu se, ɔn̰ jeegen k'lee k'taaɗɗen se aɗen kɛɗn nakŋ kɛn 'kaasn gɛn tiŋgɗe.
46009015	Ey num maam se m'ɔk ɗoobo, naɓo m'uun te nakŋ nam eyo ɔɔ kɛn m'raaŋsen maktub se kic ɓo, ɔn̰te 'saapki ɔɔki maam se m'je ɗim gɔtse ki. Maam se kɛn m'kooy kic num bɛɛ cir kɛn m'tɔnd mɛtn ɗim gɔtse ki se ɔɔ nakŋ maam m'tɔɔm rom do ki se m'je nam amsin̰ kɔɔɗ eyo.
46009016	Gɛn taaɗn Labar Jiga gɛn al‑Masi se, maam m'ɔk ɗoobm kɛn m'an tɔɔm rom eyo taa taar se lɛ Mɛljege ɓo ɛɗumsin̰o ɔɔ m'an̰ taaɗin̰ jeege tu tak. Ɔɔ kɛn maam jaay m'taaɗ Labarin̰ Jiga te ey lɛ, naan̰ se am tɛɗn ɔɔn̰ aak eyo.
46009017	Kɛn naabm se jaay maam m'tɛɗin̰ ute maraadum sum num, naan̰ se maam m'ɔk ɗoobo kɛn j'am kɔgŋ dal dubaruma. Num bin eyo! Naabm se lɛ, Raa ɓo ɛɗumsin̰ kaam jima ɔɔ m'an̰ tɛɗn tak.
46009018	Maam tap ɓo j'am kɔgŋ ɗi? Labar Jiga gɛn Isa al‑Masi kɛn maam lee taaɗ jeege tu cɛrɛ se ɓo, 'tɛɗga bɛɗuma. Ey num maam se m'ɔk ɗoobo taa Labar Jigan maam m'lee m'taaɗ se j'amga kɔgŋ ɗim, naɓo maam malin̰ ɓo baate.
46009019	Ɗeere, maam se m'ɓul nam eyo. Num gaŋ m'tɛɗn rom aan gɔɔ ɓulu se taa jeege paac, taa m'tɛɗn jeege dɛna aɗe ɓaa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki.
46009020	Ute Yaudge se, maam m'tɛɗ rom kɔɗ Yaud, taa m'ano ɓaa ute Yaudge ɗoobm al‑Masi ki. Ɔɔ kɛn ute jeegen iŋg do Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki lɛ, maam kic m'tɛɗ rom aan gɔɔ maam kic m'iŋg do Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki. Ɔɔ kɛn ɗeere num, maam m'iŋg do Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki ey sum. Kɛn ɔlum jaay maam m'tɛɗ naan̰ se, taa m'je jee kɛn iŋg do Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki se, aɗe ɓaa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki.
46009021	Ute jeegen jeel Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki ey se, maam kic m'tɛɗ rom aan gɔɔ m'jeel Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki eyo. Ey num, ɗeere, maam se m'jeel Ko Taar kɛn Raa ɛɗo Musa ki ɔɔ Ko Taar maam se, naan̰ Ko Taar gɛn Labar Jiga gɛn al‑Masi. Kɛn maam jaay m'tɛɗ rom bin se, taa m'aɗen tɛɗn naaɗe aɗe ɓaa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki.
46009022	Kɛn maam jaay m'ute jeegen ɔk tɔɔgɔ naan Raa ki ey se, maam m'iŋg aan gɔɔ naaɗe taa m'anɗeno ɓaa ɗoobm al‑Masi ki. Ɔɔ maam m'tɛɗ ute jeege paac ute ɗoobm gay gay kic ɓo taa m'kaajn̰ jee mɛtin̰gen maakɗe ki se.
46009023	Nakgen paac jaay maam m'tɛɗin̰ se, taa Labar Jigan gɛn Isa al‑Masi se 'wɔɔkŋ ɓaa ute naanin̰a. Ɔɔ maam kic ɓo m'kɔŋ bɛɗuma maakŋ bɛɛ Raa kɛn utu 'tɛɗn jeen̰ge tu se.
46009024	'Jeelki, jee paacn̰ j'ɔmbɗe gɛn naŋ naŋ deete ki se, jee paacn̰ aan̰ se, deb kalaŋ aan̰ deel se ɓo j'aalin̰ aace ɔɔ j'ɛɗin̰ bɛɗin̰a. Bin num naase kic aan̰ki aan gɔɔ gɛn debm aan̰ deel se taa j'asen kaal aace ɔɔ aki kɔŋ bɛɗse kici.
46009025	Jee paacn̰ kɛn lee aan̰ gɔtn k'lee k'taan̰ naŋ naŋ deete se, naaɗe lee dabar roɗe dɛn aak eyo. Naaɗe tɛɗin̰ se taa j'aɗen kaal aace ɔɔ kɔŋ bɛɗɗe. Naɓo kaal aacn̰ k'lee k'j'aalɗen naaɗe ki se, tɛɗga sum ɓo gɔtin̰ utu 'deele. Num gaŋ kaal aacn̰ kɛn j'aaljeki naajege tu se gɔtin̰ 'deel eyo, naan̰ se 'tiŋg gɛn daayum.
46009026	Taa naan̰ se ɓo maam kic m'aan̰ gɔtn rɛn̰ eyo, gaŋ m'aan̰ ute ɗoobin̰a taa m'kaan gɔtn kaan ki. Ɔɔ maam se m'tec aan gɔɔ debm deelga deel gɛn cɛɛpm gɛn tɔnd naapa, naɓo gɔtn tɔndki se m'ɔnd gɔtn rɛn̰ eyo.
46009027	Maam m'dabar rom dɛna, taa m'an̰ bɔɔbm kɔkɔ. Ey num maam kɛn m'taaɗo taar gɛn Isa al‑Masi jeege tu se, sɔm m'kutn naaŋa cɛrɛ.
46010001	Gɛnaamgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, 'booyki m'asen taaɗn mɛtn taar bubjegen do dɔkin̰a. Kaaɗ kɛn Musa jaay ɔɔɗo Bubjege do kɔɗ‑ɓaar ki se, naaɗe paac se gapara bɔɔbɗeno ɔɔ naaɗe paac gaaŋo Baar Aace.
46010002	Ɔɔ gapara jaay bɔɔbɗeno ute gaaŋ baar kɛn naaɗe gaaŋo se, kɛse aan gɔɔ k'batizɗenga kalaŋ ute Musa.
46010003	Naaɗe paac ɔso kɔsn kɛn bɔɔyo maakŋ raa ki.
46010004	Naaɗe paac aay maan iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki, taa naaɗe se aay maan teeco ro ko kɛn Raa ɛɗɗeno ɔɔ ko ese se, lee ute naaɗe. Ɔɔ ko se, naan̰ ɓo al‑Masi.
46010005	Ute naan̰ se kic ɓo, maakɗe ki se jee dɛnin̰ ɓo tɛɗn nakŋ kɛn tɔɔl Raa ki eyo ɔɔ maak‑taar Raa bɔɔy doɗe ki. Naaɗe ooyo ɔɔ yoɗege se ɔɔpo do kɔɗ‑ɓaar ki.
46010006	Nakgen se jaay aan doɗe ki se taa ajeki kaal bijege tu ɔɔ bin se j'aki kɔŋ dɔŋ nakŋ kusin̰ eyo aan gɔɔ kɛn naaɗe dɔŋo se.
46010007	Ɔn̰te 'daanki maraga aan gɔɔ jee mɛtin̰gen maakɗe ki tɛɗo se. Taa naan̰ se ɓo Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Naaɗe iŋg naaŋ ki, ɔso ɔɔ aayo jaay ɓo naaɗe iin̰ baag daama ɔɔ cɛɛp ute roɗe.
46010008	J'ɔn̰te 'kɛɛski naapge rɛn̰ rɛn̰ aan gɔɔ jee mɛtin̰gen maakɗe ki lee tɛɗo se. Taa naan̰ se ɓo maakŋ ɓii kalaŋ ki sum ɓo, jeege dupu‑si‑di‑kaar‑mɔtɔ ooyo.
46010009	J'ɔn̰te 'naamki Mɛljege aan gɔɔ jee mɛtin̰gen maakɗe ki naamin̰o se. Taa naan̰ se ɓo jee se wɔɔjɔ tɔɔg tɔɔlɗe.
46010010	Ɔn̰te 'mooyki naaŋ ki dir dir ute Raa aan gɔɔ jee mɛtin̰ge maakɗe ki se lee mooyo. Taa naan̰ se ɓo kɔɗn Raa debm kɔɔɗn ko jeege se 'ɓaaɗo tɔɔlɗe.
46010011	Nakgen se jaay Raa ɔn̰in̰ aan doɗe ki se, taa kaal bi jeege tun kuuy. Ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jaay ɔn̰in̰ k'raaŋin̰ maakŋ Kitap ki se lɛ, taa ajeki kaal bijege tu naajegen j'aankiga gɔɔr ute ɓii kɛn duni an naŋ se.
46010012	Taa naan̰ se ɓo debm saap maakin̰ ki ɔɔ naan̰ tɔɔg ɗoobm Raa ki se, n̰'ɔnd kɔndɔ, n̰'ɔn̰te kooco.
46010013	'Jeelki nakŋ naam kɛn aan dose ki se, lee aan do jeege tu paac kici. Ɔɔ Raa se naan̰ debm tuj ɔrmin̰ eyo ɔɔ naan̰ 'kɔŋ kɔn̰ nakŋ naam kɛn aan dose ki se, 'deel dose eyo. Ute nakŋ naam kɛn aan dose ki se, naan̰ asen taaɗn ɗoobm kɛn naase anki kaan̰ kɔtɔ ɔɔ naan̰ asen kɛɗn tɔɔgŋ kɛn naase an̰ki kaasn gɛn sɛrkin̰a.
46010014	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, jee maakjemge, ɔɔɗki dose dɔkɔ ro maragge tu.
46010015	M'taaɗsen naase ki se aan gɔɔ jee saap ɔŋ taara jaay taaɗa. Taar kɛn maam m'taaɗse se, naase 'saap ɔkki mɛtin̰ jiga.
46010016	Kɛn naajege k'ɓaaki ɓaa kɔsn, kɔsn Mɛljege jaay j'uunki kɔɔpm gɛn tɔtɔ koojn̰ bin̰ jaay k'tɔɔmki Raa se, kɛse je taaɗn ɔɔ: ute moosn Isan ɔɔy se, naajege k'tum k'tɛɗkiga kalaŋ ute Isa ey ne? Ɔɔ kɛn j'uunki mappa jaay k'dupki k'nigin̰ki ute naapa gɛn kɔsɔ se, kɛse je taaɗn ɔɔ: k'tum k'tɛɗkiga ro kalaŋ ute al‑Masi ey ne?
46010017	Taa mappan se lɛ kalaŋ sum ɔɔ naajege k'paacki se k'nig k'j'ɔski naan̰ ese sum; bin ɓo naajegen ute dɛnjege se, k'tum k'tɛɗkiga ro kalaŋ.
46010018	'Jeelki, gaan Israɛlgen lee ɔso daa kɛn naaɗe lee tɔjin̰ sɛrkɛ gɔtn kɛn k'j'iin̰in̰ gɛn lee tɛɗn sɛrkɛ Raa ki se, naaɗe se dɔɔk ute Raa kalaŋ.
46010019	Taar kɛn maam m'taaɗsen tap ɓo m'je taaɗn m'ɔɔ ɗio? Bin num daa maraga ute maragin̰ge se tap ɓo tɔɔl sɛrɛ ne?
46010020	Ɓɛrɛ gɔtɔ! Naaɗe se tɔɔl sɛr eyo. Naɓo aan gɔɔ sɛrkŋ naaɗe lee tɔj se lɛ, sitange tu ey num Raa ki eyo. Taa naan̰ se ɓo maam m'je naase aki 'dɔɔkŋ ute sitange eyo.
46010021	Anum naase aki kɔŋ kaay tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔpm Mɛljege tu jaay tɛr aki ɓaa kaay kɛn maakŋ kɔɔpm sitange tu se eyo; ɔɔ naase se aki kɔŋ kiŋg kɔsn kalaŋ do tabil ki ute Mɛljege ɔɔ tɛr aki ɓaa kɔsn ute sitange eyo.
46010022	Lɔɓu k'je j'aki kookŋ do Mɛljege tu se lɛ? Naajege se k'tɔɔg k'cirin̰ki naan̰ la?
46010023	Nam taaɗ ɔɔ: «Debkilimi ɔk ɗoobo gɛn tɛɗn nakge paac.» Naɓo, naajege tu se nakgen se paac tɔɔljeki sɛr eyo. Ɗeere, debkilimi ɔk ɗoobm gɛn tɛɗn nakge paac, naɓo naajege tu se ɔŋ noogjeki gɛn ɓaa ute naanjege eyo.
46010024	Nam ɔn̰te 'saapm do naan̰ malin̰ ki sum, num n̰'saap do jeege tun kuuy.
46010025	Naase ɔkki ɗoobo gɛn dugŋ kɔsn daagen paacn̰ maakŋ suuk ki. Kɛn 'ɓaaki ɓaa kɔs se, ɔn̰te 'tɔndki mɛta ɔɔ maakse, ɔn̰te naajn̰ do ki.
46010026	Taa Kitap taaɗ ɔɔ: Do naaŋa ute nakgen do ki paac se gɛn Mɛljege Raa.
46010027	Aan gɔɔ debm aal te maakin̰ do Isa ki ey jaay daŋse ɔɔ aki ɓaa ɓeen̰ ki se ɔɔ kɛn jaay 'ɓaakiga num, kɔsn kɛn naan̰ ɛɗsen se, ɔski, ɔn̰te 'tɔndki mɛta ɔɔ maakse, ɔn̰te naajn̰ do ki.
46010028	Kɛn nam jaay ɗeeksen ɔɔ: Kɛse lɛ daa maraga se, naase ɔn̰te 'kɔski; bin se debm kɛn aalse bise ki se, naase an̰ki 'tɛɗn maakin̰ 'naajn̰ do kɔs ki se eyo.
46010029	Maam m'taaɗ ara se ute maakŋ naan̰ kɛn utu naaj naaja ey num, ute gɛn naase eyo. Maam lɛ m'ɔk ɗoobo. Bin num gɛn ɗi jaay debm maakin̰ utu naaj naaja am gaasn gɛn kɔsn nakge se?
46010030	Kɛn maam m'ɓaa kɔsɔ jaay m'tɔɔm Raa num, gɛn ɗi jaay naai 'taaɗum taar iŋg kus do kɔs kɛn maam m'tɔɔmga tɔɔm Raa taarin̰ se?
46010031	Bin ɓo kɛn aki kɔsɔ, kɛn aki kaaye lɔ aki tɛɗn ɗi ɗi kic ɓo, 'tɛɗin̰ki paac gɛn nookŋ Raa.
46010032	Bin num kɛn ute Yaudge, jeegen Yaudge eyo, ey lɛ ute eglizn gɛn Raa se, paac se, maakŋ kiŋgse ki se, ɔn̰te 'kɔlki nam 'koocn̰ ɗoobm Raa ki.
46010033	Bin ɓo iŋgki aan gɔɔ maama: maam m'aay kaamuma ɔɔ do nakge tu paac se, m'je m'tɛɗn nakŋ kɛn 'tɔɔl jeege tu paac. Maam se m'saap do maam malin̰ ki eyo, num maam m'saap taa bɛɛ jee dɛna m'je taa Raa aɗen kaaja.
46011001	Aan gɔɔ maam m'uun bɔlɔtn al‑Masi se, naase kic ɓo uunki bɔlɔtuma.
46011002	Maam se m'tɔɔmse, taa naase se tɛɗga tak ɓo, naase 'saapki dom ki ɔɔ naase utu iŋg 'bɔɔbki taar kɛn maam m'dooyseno se.
46011003	Naɓo maam m'je taar se, naase an̰ki jeel kɔkŋ jiga: gaabge paac se, al‑Masi ɓo doɗe ki ɔɔ mɛnda lɛ, gaaba ɓo don̰ ki ɔɔ al‑Masi lɛ, Raa ɓo don̰ ki.
46011004	Kaaɗn keem Raa ki jaay ɓo gaabm kɛn taaɗ taar teeco taar Raa ki ey lɛ eem keem Raa jaay aal kala don̰ ki se, kɛse naan̰ ɔl al‑Masi ɓo maakŋ sɔkɔn̰ ki.
46011005	Num gaŋ kɛn mɛnda jaay kaaɗn keem Raa ki, ɓaa taaɗn taar teeco taar Raa ki ey lɛ ɓaa keem Raa jaay aal te kala don̰ ki ey se, kɛse naan̰ ɔl gaabin̰ ɓo maakŋ sɔkɔn̰ ki ɔɔ mɛnd bin se tec aan gɔɔ mɛnd k'dɔsin̰ga dɔs don̰a kɛn ɔlin̰ sɔkɔn̰ tɔɔlin̰ se.
46011006	Kɛn mɛnda jaay baate kaal kala don̰ ki se, bɛɛkin̰ se k'dɔsin̰sin̰ naatn. 'Jeelki, kɛn mɛnda jaay j'ɔj k'naŋin̰ga bɛɛkin̰ tak tak ey lɛ k'dɔsin̰sin̰ga se, tɛɗin̰ sɔkɔn̰ tɔɔlin̰a. Bin num ɔn̰ mɛnda tak ɓo kaal kala don̰ ki don̰ ki.
46011007	Num kɛn gaaba jaay ɓaa keem Raa num, ɔn̰te kaal kala don̰ ki, taa gaaba se Raa aalin̰ tecin̰ naan̰a taa an̰ nooko. Gaŋ mɛnda lɛ, Raa aalin̰ se gɛn nookŋ gaabin̰a.
46011008	Taa gaaba se teeco ro mɛnd ki eyo, num mɛnda ɓo teeco ro gaab ki.
46011009	Gaaba se Raa aalin̰o taa mɛnd eyo, num mɛnda lɛ nookŋ gaabin̰a.
46011010	Taa kɔɗn Raage se ɓo mɛnda se n̰'aal kala don̰ ki ɔɔ ute kal kɛn naan̰ aal don̰ ki se je taaɗn ɔɔ naan̰ se sook deb kɛn ɔk tɔɔgɔ don̰ ki se.
46011011	Ute naan̰ se kic ɓo, naan Mɛljege tu se, mɛnda kalin̰ ki sum se kɔŋ kaan̰ kaam eyo ɔɔ gaaba kic lɛ kalin̰ ki sum se kɔŋ kaan̰ kaam ey kici.
46011012	Aan gɔɔ mɛnda lɛ teeco ro gaab ki se, gaab kic lɛ mɛnda ɓo oojin̰a; num naaɗe paac se iin̰o gɔtn Raa ki.
46011013	Naase malin̰ge aakin̰ki tu. Kɛn jeege tusga gɛn keem Raa jaay mɛnda aal te kala don̰ ki ey sum ɓo eem Raa se, dɔɔɗn ne?
46011014	Kɛn j'aakin̰ kaak bin kic ɓo, gaaba jaay ul bɛɛkin̰ tɛɗ jɛrl se, sɔkɔn̰ ey ne?
46011015	Gaŋ mɛnda jaay bɛɛkin̰ dɛn se, ɔkin̰a. Bɛɛkin̰ kɛn Raa ɛɗin̰ dɛn se, tɛɗin̰ tec aan gɔɔ mɛnd kɛn aalga kaal kala don̰ ki.
46011016	Ɔɔ debm jaay je tookŋ do taarge tun maam m'taaɗsen ey se, maam ute eglizgen gɛn Raa se lɛ, kɛse ɓo nakŋ kɛn naaje k'lee k'tɛɗa.
46011017	Do taarge tun maam m'je m'asen taaɗse, maam m'asen kɔŋ tɔɔm eyo. Taa kɛn naase jaay 'tuskiga gɛn keem Raa se, naase 'tɛɗki nakgen kusin̰ ɓo cir kɛn bɛɛ.
46011018	Anum nakŋ deet deet se k'taaɗum j'ɔɔ: kɛn naase jaay 'tuskiga gɛn keem Raa num, naase 'lee 'gaaŋki ute naapa. Ɔɔ do taar kɛn se, m'jeelin̰ kɛngen mɛtin̰ge se, mɛt ki.
46011019	Bin num maam m'jeele maakse ki se, jeege utu 'gaaŋ ute naapa, bin jaay ɓo j'kaakŋ jeel jee kɛn ɔk taar Raa ɔɔn̰ se.
46011020	Kɛn naase 'tuskiga gɛn keem Raa jaay ɔski kɔs ute naapa se, kɛn maam m'aakin̰ ara ki num, aan gɔɔ kɔsn gɛn Mɛljege eyo.
46011021	Taa kɛn naase jaay iŋgkiga gɔtn kɔs ki se, naŋa naŋa kic ɓo naar ɔs kɔsin̰ kɔsin̰ kɛn naan̰ ɓaano. Bin ɓo jee mɛtin̰ge lɛ, ɓo tɔɔlɗe tɔɔlɔ ɔɔ jeegen kuuy se lɛ, aay bini oon koono.
46011022	Kɛn bin num, ɔski ɔɔ aayki ɓeesege tu. Lɔ naase ɔkki ɓeege ey ne? Kɛn naase jaay 'tɛɗki bin se, naase uum aalki kaal egliz gɛn Raa se ɓo naaŋ ki ɔɔ gɛnaagen ɔk ɗim ey se lɛ, naase aakɗeki kaakŋ mɛtɗe. Anum do taarge tun ese se, naase 'jeki m'asen taaɗn m'ɔɔ ɗi? M'asenga tɔɔm la? Gɔtɔ. Do nakge tun naase 'tɛɗki se, maam m'asen kɔŋ tɔɔm eyo.
46011023	'Booyki! Kɛse ɓo taar kɛn Mɛljege dooyumo ɔɔ maam kic m'dooyseno m'ɔɔ: maakŋ nɔɔr kɛn j'an kɔkŋ Mɛljege Isa se, naan̰ uun mappa jin̰ ki,
46011024	ɔɔ kɛn naan̰ jaay tɔɔm Raa aas se, naan̰ dupin̰a ɔɔ ɗeek ɔɔ: «Kɛse ɓo roma kɛn m'ɛɗin̰ sɛrkɛ taa naase. Nakŋ se 'lee 'tɛɗin̰ki bini ɔɔ 'saapki dom ki.»
46011025	Kɛn naaɗe jaay ɔs aas se, Mɛljege uun kɔɔpm ɗooc ute tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ se ɔɔ tɛɗin̰ bin kici, taaɗɗen ɔɔ: «Tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔp kɛn ese se je taaɗn ute moosum 'kɔɔy se, kɛse je taaɗn ɔɔ: Raa dɔɔkga kiji ute naase. Daayum kɛn naase 'ɓaaki ɓaa kaaye se, 'tɛɗin̰ki bini ɔɔ 'saapki dom ki.»
46011026	Daayum kɛn naase jaay 'tuskiga gɛn kɔsn mappan ese se ɔɔ gɛn kaay tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔp kɛn ese se, kɛse naase 'taaɗki mɛtn taar kooy Mɛljege bini, ɓii kɛn naan̰ aɗe tɛrl ro ki.
46011027	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, debm ɔs mappa gɛn Mɛljege ɔɔ aay tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔp Mɛljege tu ute ɗoobin̰ ey se, bɔɔrɔ utu koocn̰ don̰ ki taa daa ro Mɛljege ute moosin̰ se, naan̰ aalɗen te maak ki eyo.
46011028	Taa naan̰ se ɓo naŋa naŋa kic kɛn ɓaa ɓaa kɔsn mappm ese se ɔɔ ɓaa 'kaay tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔp kɛn ese, n̰'saap do ron̰ ki jaay 'kɔsɔ ɔɔ 'kaaye.
46011029	Anum debm jaay ɔs mappan se ɔɔ aay tɔtn koojn̰ bin̰ kɛn maakŋ kɔɔp ki se, saap te do ro Mɛljege tu eyo jaay ɔsɔ ɔɔ aay se, kɛse naan̰ malin̰ ɓo tɛɗ bɔɔrɔ ooc don̰ ki.
46011030	Taa naan̰ se ɓo maakse ki se jeege dɛna tɛɗga kɔɔn̰ɔ, jeege dɛna kɔɔn̰ɔ tujɗenga ɔɔ jee mɛtin̰ge ooyga.
46011031	Kɛn naajege jaay k'jeelki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do naaje malin̰ge tu se, Raa ajeki kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ dojege tu eyo.
46011032	Anum kɛn Mɛljege jaay ɔjjeki bɔɔrɔ dojege tu se, kɛse naan̰ dɛjjeki dɛjje. Taa ɓii kɛn naan̰ 'kɔjn̰ bɔɔrɔ do duni ki se, bɔɔrɔ 'koocn̰ dojege tu ey sum.
46011033	Bin ɓo gɛnaamgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, kɛn 'tuskiga gɛn kɔsn, kɔsn Mɛljege se, 'booyki naapa.
46011034	Kɛn debm jaay ɓo tɔɔlin̰ lɛ, n̰'ɔs ɓeen̰ ki. Bin ɓo kɛn naase 'tuskiga se, bɔɔrɔ 'koocn̰ dose ki eyo. Taargen ɔɔp se, kɛn maam m'ɓaaga gɔtse ki jaay ɓo, m'asen ɓaa taaɗn naŋ mɛtin̰a.
46012001	Gɛnaamgen ɗoobm al‑Masi ki, ɓɔrse maam m'je m'asen tɛrl do mɛtn taar naab kɛn Nirl Raa ɛɗ jeege tu se. Maam m'je m'asen kɔn̰ naase aki kiŋg do dɛrlse ki eyo.
46012002	Do dɔkin̰, kɛn naase 'jeelkiro te Raa mal ey se, kaaɗ kɛn naane se, nakŋ ɔk tɔɔgɔ dose ki se 'tɔɔɗ ɔlseno gɔtn raasege tun ɔŋ taaɗ taar ey se, ɔɔ naase lɛ ɔŋ aasin̰kiro gɛn ɗaar tɔɔg eyo.
46012003	Taa naan̰ se ɓo, 'booyki m'asen taaɗa: debm jaay taaɗ ɔɔ: ɔn̰ Raa 'naam Isa se, debm bin se naan̰ ɔk Nirl Raa maakin̰ ki eyo. Ɔɔ debm taaɗ ɔɔ: Isa se Mɛljege se, debm bin se ɔk Nirl Salal maakin̰ ki.
46012004	Nirl Salal se, naan̰ kalaŋ sum, naɓo nakgen kɛn naan̰ ɛɗ jeege tu se, dɔɔlin̰ dɛna.
46012005	Mɛljege se kic naan̰ kalaŋ sum, naɓo naabm kɛn naan̰ ɛɗ jeege tu se, dɔɔlin̰ dɛna.
46012006	Raa kɛn tɛɗn naaba maakŋ jeege tu paac se, naan̰ kalaŋ sum, naɓo ɗoobm kɛn naan̰ ɛɗo gɛn tɛɗn naabin̰ se, dɔɔlin̰ dɛna.
46012007	Naŋa naŋa kic ɓo Raa ɛɗin̰ Nirl Salal maakin̰ ki se, taa an tɛɗn naabm kɛn 'noogŋ jee Raage paac.
46012008	Deb kalaŋ se, Nirl Raa ɛɗin̰ jeel‑taara gɛn taaɗn taar jeege tu ɔɔ deb kuuy se, Nirl Raa ese sum ɓo ɛɗin̰ jeele gɛn jeel naka.
46012009	Nirl Raa ese sum ɓo, tɛɗ deb kalaŋ aal maakin̰ do Isa ki cir gɛn jeegen kuuy se ɔɔ deb kuuy se, naan̰ ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgɔ gɛn kɛɗn lapia jee kɔɔn̰ge tu.
46012010	Deb kuuy lɛ, Nirl Raa ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgŋ gɛn tɛɗn nakŋ‑kɔɔɓge, deb kɛn kuuy naan̰ ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgŋ gɛn taaɗn taar teeco taar Raa ki. Ɔɔ deb kɛn kuuy se, naan̰ ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgŋ kɛn an jeel nakgen kɛn iin̰o gɔtn Nirl Salal ki ey lɛ gɔtn sitange tu. Ɔɔ deb kɛn kuuy se, naan̰ ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgŋ gɛn jeel taaɗn taar naaŋgen jeege jeel eyo. Ɔɔ tɛr deb kɛn kuuy lɛ, naan̰ ɛɗin̰ tɔɔgŋ gɛn jeel taaɗn tɔɔkŋ mɛtn taar naaŋgen jeege jeel ey se.
46012011	Ɔɔ kɛse Nirl Raa kalaŋ ese sum ɓo tɛɗin̰ nakgen se paac ɔɔ naŋa naŋa kic ɓo naan̰ ɛɗin̰ naabin̰ naabin̰ aan gɔɔ kɛn naan̰ maakin̰ jen ro ki.
46012012	Aakki tu: ro debkilimi se, naan̰ kalaŋ sum, naɓo tɔp kaam dɛna. Ute tɔpm kɛn naan̰ tɔp kaam dɛn se kic ɓo tum tɛɗ ro kalaŋ. Jeegen kɛn dɔɔkga ute al‑Masi se kic ɓo tec bini.
46012013	Ɔɔ naajege paacki se kɛn Yaudge ey lɛ Grɛkge, ɓulge ey lɛ ɓulge eyo, k'batizjekiro ute Nirl Salal kalaŋ ese sum ɔɔ k'tum k'tɛɗkiga aan gɔɔ ro kalaŋ. Ɔɔ Raa ɛɗjekiga Nirlin̰ se maakjege tu.
46012014	Bin ɓo ro debkilimi se naan̰ kaam kalaŋ sum eyo, naɓo naan̰ tɔp kaam dɛna.
46012015	Jɛ se 'kɔŋ taaɗn ɔɔ: «Maam lɛ m'ji ey se, m'kɔŋ tɛɗn maakŋ ro ki eyo.» Anum kɛn naan̰ taaɗ bin sum ɓo, 'kɔŋ tɛɗn maakŋ ro debkilim ki ey ne?
46012016	Bi se 'kɔŋ taaɗn ɔɔ: «Maam lɛ m'kaama ey se, m'kɔŋ tɛɗn maakŋ ro debkilim ki eyo.» Anum kɛn naan̰ taaɗ bin sum ɓo, 'kɔŋ tɛɗn maakŋ ro debkilim ki ey ne?
46012017	Kɛn ro debkilimi jaay kaam kalin̰ ki sum num, naan̰ tap ɓo 'booy ute ɗio? Ɔɔ kɛn ro paac ɓo bi kalin̰ ki sum num, naan̰ 'kootn ute ɗio?
46012018	Ɗeere, ro debkilimi se, Raa tɔndin̰sin̰ga ute ɗoobin̰ tak tak aan gɔɔ kɛn naan̰ maakin̰ jen ro ki.
46012019	Ro debkilim jaay ɔk ro kaam kalaŋ sum num, kɛse j'an̰ kɔŋ daŋ ro ute magalin̰ eyo.
46012020	Ɗeere, ro debkilimi se tɔp kaam dɛna naɓo kɛn tumga se, tɛɗ ro kalaŋ.
46012021	Kaama 'kɔŋ taaɗn ji ki ɔɔ: «Maam se m'an ɗim ute naai eyo.» Ɔɔ do lɛ 'kɔŋ taaɗn jɛge tu ɔɔ: «Maam se m'an ɗim ute naase eyo.»
46012022	Num gaŋ roi kaam kalaŋ kɛn naai aakin̰ ɔɔ ɔk tɔɔg ey se, kɛn naan̰ jaay gɔtɔ num, kiŋgi se ai tɛɗn ɔɔn̰ɔ.
46012023	Maakŋ ro ki se gɔtn kɛn kaam kalaŋ j'aalɗen maak ki ey se, naaɗe se ɓo kɛn k'lee k'j'ɔkɗeki ɔɔn̰ɔ. Ɔɔ kɛngen k'lee k'tɔyɗeki tɔy se ɓo, kɛn k'lee k'j'aakki doɗege tu ɗawal ɗawal,
46012024	gaŋ kɛngen k'j'aakɗenki tal tal se je j'aɗen tɛɗn bin eyo. Anum ro kaam kalaŋ k'tɔyɗe tɔy se ɓo, Raa tɔndɗen se, taa j'aɗenki kɔkŋ ɔɔn̰ɔ.
46012025	Ro jaay Raa tɛɗin̰ bin se, taa 'tɔpm naap eyo, num taa naaɗe 'kaakŋ do naapge tu.
46012026	Kɛn ro kaam kalaŋ jaay ɔŋga dubara se, ro ute magalin̰ paac dabara. Ɔɔ kɛn ro kaam kalaŋ jaay ɓo tɛɗga nakŋ bɛɛ k'tɔɔmin̰ga lɛ, ro ute magalin̰ paac 'tɛɗ maak‑raapo.
46012027	Aan gɔɔ ro debkilimi tɔp kaam dɛn jaay dɔɔk tum tɛɗ ro kalaŋ se, ɗeere, naase kic ɓo 'dɛnki, naɓo 'tum 'tɛɗkiga ro al‑Masi ɔɔ naŋa naŋa kic ɓo utu gɔtin̰ gɔtin̰a.
46012028	Bin ɓo, maakŋ egliz ki se, deet deet se, Raa tɔnd jee kaan̰ naabm Isage. Gɛn k‑dige se, naan̰ bɛɛr tɔɔɗ jee kɛn taaɗ taar teeco taarin̰ ki. Gɛn k‑mɔtɔge tu se, naan̰ tɔnd jee dooy jeege. Ɔɔ mɛtn naaɗe ki se, naan̰ tɔnd jee tɛɗn nakŋ‑kɔɔɓge, tɛr naan̰ tɔnd jeegen ɛɗ lapi jee kɔɔn̰ge tu ɔɔ tɔnd jee mɛtin̰ge gɛn noogŋ jeege. Jee mɛtin̰ge naan̰ tɔndɗe jee kɛn 'tɔɔɗn jeege ute jee kɛn taaɗn taar naaŋgen jeege jeel eyo.
